title: O que são NFTs?
body:
## Definição

A tecnologia dos NFTs, **Non-Fungible Tokens**, foi creada em 2017 através de contratos inteligentes na blockchain Ethereum. No início de 2021, os NFTs entram de repente em destaque no mundo das criptomoedas e tecnologia subjacente (blockchain).

Um NFT é um tipo de token. **Mas o que são tokens?**

**Tokens** são unidades virtuais que confirmam a posse de certo activo digital. Os tokens operam com base na tecnologia blockchain, aquela que está na base das criptomoedas. Para entender melhor os conceitos **blockchain** e **criptomoeda**, recomendo a leitura deste artigo:

[https://mirror.xyz/0x2DBF911D78815D995B05bc8FA42e378f78D7CC7b/0vQjECsvCIYUAkSbXuKWo3Jncbsg3ZiaaS0-2fraLnQ](https://mirror.xyz/0x2DBF911D78815D995B05bc8FA42e378f78D7CC7b/0vQjECsvCIYUAkSbXuKWo3Jncbsg3ZiaaS0-2fraLnQ)

Entre todos os tokens existentes (mais de 13 000 neste momento - o site [Coingecko](https://www.coingecko.com/) chama-os todos de ‘Coins’, mas na realidade só alguns são moedas) há alguns que se chamam moedas. Uma moeda, ou criptomoeda, é semelhante a uma moeda física, e é um token nativo de certa blockchain. Cada blockchain só tem uma moeda, mas pode ter vários tokens. As moedas tipicamente têm o mesmo nome da blockchain onde operam. Por exemplo, [SOLANA](https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/solana) (SOL) é a moeda da blockchain Solana, e [SOLCIAL](https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/solcial) (SLCL) é um token que opera nessa mesma blockchain. Por exemplo, [ETHEREUM ou ETHER](https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/ethereum) (ETH) é a moeda da blockchain Ethereum, e [BASIC ATTENTION TOKEN](https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/basic-attention-token) (BAT) é um token que opera nessa mesma blockchain. Note-se que tokens que não sejam nativos, i.e não sejam moedas, podem existir em várias blockchains, como é o caso do BAT (tal facto está indicado no campo ‘Contract’, menu **…**, em **Info** - ver link acima).

Os portadores de tokens podem, além de os guardar nas suas carteiras digitais, trocá-los por outros tokens em casas de cambio online, vendê-los (NFTs) em *marketplaces*, oferecê-los, ou usá-los para comprar algo. Existem vários tipos de tokens, entre os quais destaco:

* **Pagamento** – usado para efectuar transações financeiras no mundo digital (moedas como Solana, Cardano, Bitcoin, Ethereum).
* **Utilitário** – usado para dar acesso a produtos ou serviços baseados em alguma blockchain.

  Todos os tipos anteriores são **fungíveis** (*fungible tokens*), ou seja, podem ser trocados por algo de valor igual – 1 Bitcoin na mão da pessoa A vale o mesmo que 1 Bitcoin na mão da pessoa B, ou seja, se as pessoas trocarem as moedas o cenário não se altera. Tal não se passa com os NFTs, pois cada um é único. Diz-se por isso que são **não-fungíveis**.
* **NFT** – certificados digitais únicos de trabalhos originais, onde o criador original terá sempre controlo sobre a forma como o trabalho é licensiado. São compostos por vários elementos, tais como:
  * **conteúdo digital** que representa – ficheiro de imagem, audio, texto, ou vídeo (tipicamente guardado, juntamente com outros metadados, de forma descentralizada e fora da blockchain onde está o NFT - e.g, na redes [IPFS](https://ipfs.io/) ou [Arweave](https://www.arweave.org/)).
  * **criador** – identificação do criador do token.
  * **proprietário** – identificação do actual proprietário do token, o qual será ainda o criador se o token não tiver sido oferecido ou vendido.
  * **preço ou ofertas**, caso esteja à venda ou em leilão.
  * **outros metadados** – informações sobre o activo digital, como assinatura do criador, descrição, tipo de ficheiro, resolução, histórico de transações, data e hora da sua criação, …

Outra diferença entre **NFTs** e tokens fungíveis (como moedas, por exemplo) é a **indivisibilidade** dos primeiros. Por exemplo, poderás enviar 0.05 Bitcoins a um amigo, mas não poderás fazer o mesmo com 5% de um NFT.

## Valor

Se todos os criadores digitais publicarem os seus novos trabalhos, originais, como NFT, todo aquele que tentar copiar o seu trabalho e certificá-lo como NFT, muito dificilmente terá o seu trabalho reconhecido como original. Isto porque existem mecanismos (e cada vez existirão mais) para saber se certo conteúdo digital já foi publicado mais que uma vez na web como NFT (e.g, vários marketplaces fazem essa fiscalização, em breve existirão **motores de busca de NFTs** – ver websites em baixo, e poderás usar o [motor de busca da Google](https://images.google.com/) para saber a localização de certo ficheiro de imagem).

[https://nftsearch.site/](https://nftsearch.site/)

**Nota**: *se ainda não existir na base de dados, deverás/poderás adicionar o NFT que procuras à mesma*.

[https://hebys.io/](https://hebys.io/)

[https://nooft.io/](https://nooft.io/)

Regra geral, é possível salvar ou copiar o conteúdo digital de um NFT, seja uma imagem, vídeo, áudio ou documento, mas nunca será possível copiar o NFT. Esse terá sempre um único proprietário. Uma pessoa que crie um NFT com base na cópia  (ficheiro, screenshot) do conteúdo digital de outro NFT, terá sempre em sua posse um NFT distinto, publicado em data posterior à do original.

> *Markets for traditional art and collectibles are thriving despite forgeries, and the issue is even smaller with NFTs* ([ref](https://archive.ph/ptRTw))

Os NFTs podem ser programados para permitir ao criador/autor arrecadar dinheiro sempre que o NFT for vendido, normalmente entre 2.5% a 10% do preço de venda.

## Como Criar e Comercializar?

Qualquer pessoa pode criar algo digitalmente, transformá-lo num NFT em alguma blockchain (processo chamado ‘Minting’ em Inglês), e colocar esse token para venda em algum *marketplace* online. Alguns locais cobram para publiar os teus NFTs. Qualquer marketplace cobra uma taxa do valor de venda de cada NFT, a qual poderá ser suportada pelo comprador ou pelo vendedor, dependendo da plataforma.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/GGvxJ9xOJMs4wmx6mBN0S.png?height=530&width=1127)

De modo a poderes comprar um NFT, precisarás de dispor na tua carteira digital da criptomoeda associada à blockchain onde o token está alojado.

### Marketplaces

Neste momento, os seguintes 3 mercados permitem-te criar e vender NFTs de forma gratuita:

* **[Rarible](https://rarible.com)** ([ref](https://archive.ph/Qd8Oa)) - neste caso de ***lazy minting***, o NFT só será gravado na blockchain no acto de uma eventual compra… o que não é uma boa solução se quiseres garantir que és o autor original da tua criação.
* **[Mintable](https://mintable.app)**
* **[OpenSea](https://opensea.io/)** ([ref](https://archive.ph/Nmg0g))

Outras Apps que sigo:

[https://solsea.io/](https://solsea.io/)

## Como ‘Eliminar’ NFTs?

[https://mirror.xyz/0x2DBF911D78815D995B05bc8FA42e378f78D7CC7b/uqMmgRHtD2-_qh8TlCK7HS81wAK3Wji5RzrDZFHdWls](https://mirror.xyz/0x2DBF911D78815D995B05bc8FA42e378f78D7CC7b/uqMmgRHtD2-_qh8TlCK7HS81wAK3Wji5RzrDZFHdWls)

## Alguns dos meus NFTs favoritos

[https://mirror.xyz/0x2DBF911D78815D995B05bc8FA42e378f78D7CC7b/DYafuIOSswfJoy8w7yMZIlC2PS51RSHoikcKXpsGhj4](https://mirror.xyz/0x2DBF911D78815D995B05bc8FA42e378f78D7CC7b/DYafuIOSswfJoy8w7yMZIlC2PS51RSHoikcKXpsGhj4)

## NFTs na construção de redes sociais descentralizadas

[https://lens.xyz/](https://lens.xyz/)

title: Community poll: what are the best platforms and communities for web3 founders? (NFTmemo #6)
body:
### Where do web3 founders & creators hang? Calling on the community to add their two cents, so we can guide new creators and founders coming into the space.

I have taken a bit of a break from writing [NFT memos](https://www.mattbullish.com/) during the last few months focusing on [The Divergents](https://thedivergents.io/) (NFT collection), [Playgrid](https://playgrid.io/) (Steam for blockchain gaming), and attending conferences [NFC](https://www.nonfungibleconference.com/), [NFT.NYC](https://www.nft.nyc/) or [UTXO](https://utxo.cz/) (spoke at [NFT use cases panel](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=t4pS7o3UTAc&feature=emb_title)) evaluating my position in the NFT space. I however now plan to write more often as those who build during bear markets GMI.🚀

Instead of the usual NFT market analysis, this time I have decided to put together a list of communities and platforms that could be valuable for founders & digital entrepreneurs dedicated to building in the web3 space. As an NFT founder & advisor, I continuously search for supportive and resourceful collectives and platforms, that would help me in my web3 journey. Whether it be knowledge, tools, network, advice, or investment opportunities.

Due to the fast-paced environment, use of gate-keeping mechanisms, and fragmentation into a large number of communities, it may be hard for a newcomer but also an experienced participant in this ecosystem to have a good overview of these communities & platforms. I have therefore decided to **call on the web3 community** to throw two cents on what space was most helpful on their journey and why.

**Are you a creator or founder? I would be grateful for your opinion on what community or platform helped you on your journey below ([new window](https://survey.typeform.com/to/eaBvGBH6)).**

[https://form.typeform.com/to/eaBvGBH6?typeform-embed-id=6973618512483848?display=iframe](https://form.typeform.com/to/eaBvGBH6?typeform-embed-id=6973618512483848?display=iframe)

Below I provide a list of communities, platforms, initiatives, DAOs, alpha chats, or IRL events that I know of and could be a good starting point. I am not in all of these, so I will always appreciate a second opinion. With a background focused mainly on NFTs, I may be leaning more towards NFT-focused spaces but will do my best to keep the list balanced.

### Communities

* **[Crypto Packaged Goods (CPG)](https://www.cryptopackagedgoods.com/)** - a collective that runs on two token-gated [Telegram chats](https://medium.com/@cryptopackagedgoods/cpg-telegram-entry-faq-4e27378370a8) - for [Genesis](https://market.cryptopackagedgoods.com/collections/0x837b40be9ce60c79b63d1356a5f9fcad721421ec) and [Pop](https://market.cryptopackagedgoods.com/collections/0x7eaa96d48380802a75ed6d74b91e2b30c3d474c1) NFT holders. CPG runs also its own incubator for POP members that opened applications on 23rd May and [consulting arm](https://www.cpg.consulting/) managed by CPG members. ([Public Telegram](https://t.me/+UM77pmRQDX40Mzkx))
* **[HUG ](https://thehug.xyz/)**– is a community for collectors and web3 creators (HUGHub). Its original project is groupHUG - a creator accelerator program for post-mint NFT projects and up-and-coming 1/1 artists. The platform also runs an advisory program for early-stage pre-mint NFT projects. ([Discord](https://discord.gg/thehugxyz))
* **[Admit one](https://g.money/)** - is a private group created by [Gmoney](https://twitter.com/gmoneyNFT) for 1000 web3 enthusiasts, builders, and thought leaders token gated by [Admit One NFT](https://opensea.io/collection/admit-one). If you want to dig deeper here is the [manifesto](https://g.money/manifesto). ([Discord](https://discord.com/invite/gmoney))
* **[Midnight labs](https://www.joinmidnightlabs.com/)** - is a web3 collective for collectors and builders created by [Giancarlo](https://mobile.twitter.com/GiancarloChaux), who a few months ago [opened member applications](https://mobile.twitter.com/GiancarloChaux/status/1521923657462820864), which are currently frozen. You can [register](https://lhxlnynso6g.typeform.com/to/EPRmiltq) to get notified when the community reopens or try to get in by other means. ([Discord](https://discord.com/invite/vAxZapwM98))

*Whereas **[Probably Something](https://probablysomething.io/)** is a more product-oriented platform with a focus on creating software for NFT creators/collectors, the [token-gated](https://probablysomething.io/genesis) community around it could be worth a look. ([Discord](https://discord.com/invite/PuGcUH6vjH))*

### Platforms & initiatives

* **[Launch House](https://www.launchhouse.com/)** - a collective of social clubs [supported by a16z](https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20220201005377/en/Launch-House-Announces-12-Million-Series-A-Led-by-Andreessen-Horowitz) for founders, engineers, and investors. You can [apply](https://home.launchhouse.com/apply) to different cohorts based on your background - web3 founder residency (Launch House), Investor residency (Venture House), or Design house. They throw also IRL events and had some interesting ones during NFT.NYC.
* **[Forefront](https://forefront.market/)** – a launchpad for web3 founders that want to create a tokenized community that is behind [Terminal](https://www.terminal.co/community/featured/ffdao.eth) - a dashboard for DAOs. Part of Forefront is [Canon](https://forefront.market/canon) - a curated list of resources for digital communities, FF Labs which throws workshops and aims to execute the best ideas [submitted by the community](https://labs.forefront.club/). ([Discord](https://discord.gg/forefront))
* **[Angel Labs](https://www.angel-labs.io/)** - web3 accelerator from [Meta Angels NFT](https://www.metaangelsnft.com/) managed by [Cheryl Kellond](https://twitter.com/XXfounder) to support the next generation of NFT projects. The accelerator so far had only one cohort in early 2022. ([Discord](https://discord.com/invite/metaangels))

### **DAOs**

* **[Seed Club](https://www.seedclub.xyz/)** - social token incubator, that helps developers launch successful social tokens. Seed Club operates an accelerator to provide support to and bring together exciting new social impact projects, and has a portfolio consisting of SquiggleDAO, SongCamp, PartyDAO, and more. You can dig deeper by checking out their [intro article](https://medium.com/seedclub/introducing-seed-club-a-social-token-incubator-490c0474421b), [Notion](https://seedclub.notion.site/Seed-Club-Start-Here-b6f41decca25404dbc24e70dcb34dd2c), applying as a [community member](https://airtable.com/shrObZ3OEIoWLJaqm) or into their [next cohort](https://airtable.com/shr35dCkkt6Dxy7OY). ([Discord](https://discord.gg/ymQAr9sFKA))
* **[Orange DAO](https://www.orangedao.xyz/)** - a collective open only to YC alums supporting founders of crypto startups. Part of Orange DAO is also Orange Fund - a web3 venture fund. You can apply for funding [here](https://airtable.com/shrFujNXdLnzjY6RQ). If you are not YC alumni, you can [apply](https://airtable.com/shrihSLAIw9SiNmFd) to get informed if Orange DAO decides to extend their web3 community.
* **[LobsterDAO](https://github.com/lobster-dao/overview)** - an OG collective of DeFi & NFT degens and whales. Might be worth exploring for those with DeFi focus - [DeFi research chat](https://t.me/lobsters_chat), [general NFT chat](https://t.me/NFT_avenue), and [NFT-gated chat](https://telegram.me/collablandbot?start=VFBDI1RFTCNDT01NIy0xMDAxNTc3NzExMjQx), for which you need [LobsterDAO NFT](https://opensea.io/collection/lobsterdao).
* **[Friends With Benefits (FWB)](https://www.fwb.help/)** - a social DAO that describes itself as “a worldwide group of cultural creators, thinkers, and builders who convene digitally and IRL to collaboratively shape Web3´s future”, you can [apply to join here](https://www.fwb.help/join). I have attended their events, but still, have a pending application, so would be happy for an opinion on this one. ([Discord](https://discord.com/invite/3jCyswsKFn))

*For those looking for application designers and devs, **[VectorDAO](https://vectordao.com/)** could be of interest - a “collective of application designers & developers contributing work to crypto protocols in order to accelerate their mainstream adoption.“ You can apply to join [here](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScRbq4RvW6mTa_gjbpxGtE1JPUS4WqCmY7xkjJB3DitkbHqIg/viewform).*

### **Tools**

* **[Premint Creator key](https://creators.premint.xyz/)** - a good tool for NFT projects. As this tool is intended primarily for core teams, it is likely that at [Discord](https://discord.gg/byYaqc668D) you will run into and can DM other NFT founders. From my experience, it is way more likely they actually reply than writing them on Twitter. You can join without buying the key, but you will not be able to see hidden channels for collaborations etc.

### Alpha chats

* **[NFT Avenue](https://t.me/NFT_avenue)** - general NFT chat on Telegram created by [LobsterDAO](https://github.com/lobster-dao/overview) open to the public. One can occasionally catch there some interesting updates or projects.

### In real life (IRL) events

IRL events might be sometimes the best way to make meaningful relationships with founders and creators. A good overview of blockchain events you can find [here](https://www.bizzabo.com/blog/blockchain-events/).

* **[NFT.NYC (US)](https://www.nft.nyc/)** - NFT.NYC is the biggest global NFT event. From my experience, if you do not plan to catch speakers right after their talks, it is better to focus on the satellite events themselves. Most of the listed communities throw events on their own during the conference.
* **[Veecon (US)](https://veecon.co/)** – the first Veecon, a conference organized by Gary Vee, took a place on 19th-22nd May in Minneapolis. [Ticket NFTs](https://opensea.io/collection/veecon-tickets) for Veecon [were airdropped](https://blog.veefriends.com/veecon-2022-ticket-nfts-airdropped-e1ae5c4df27b) to Veefriends Series 1 holders as this is a core utility of the NFTs. I heard only good things from friends that have attended. Let´s see about next year.
* **[Non-Fungible Conference (EU](https://www.nonfungibleconference.com/))** – I consider NFC the biggest NFT event in Europe. It took a place in Lisbon on 4th-5th April. I met some founders there but to a limited extent. I share my experience from NFC [here](https://twitter.com/mattbullish/status/1512534125483372546). title: Rethink on All the Good Things
body:
> Do what you love. Find your true love. 
>
> Have passion. Be happy.

Those were the rules I lived for, yet they never led me anywhere except only momentary excitement that dissolves itself without a single trace.

They’re only the carrot on a stick, a marriage that tactfully built for people to look up to.

Modern society has done a successful job of marketing all the good concepts to us.

We chase after these concepts, assuming everything will improve when we have found the one, yet it’s a never-ending chasing game.

*How to escape from the game?*

Stop chasing those goals.

> Have passion. Be happy.

Those were the rules I lived for, yet they never led me anywhere except only momentary excitement that dissolves itself without a single trace.

They’re only the carrot on a stick, a marriage that tactfully built for people to look up to.

Modern society has done a successful job of marketing all the good concepts to us.

We chase after these concepts, assuming everything will improve when we have found the one, yet it’s a never-ending chasing game.

*How to escape from the game?*

Stop chasing those goals.

## 1. 美国第二大电力公司杜克能源正在研究比特币挖矿

7月4日消息，美国第二大电力公司杜克能源（Duke Energy）正在探索比特币挖矿。据报道，该公司正计划将挖矿活动整合为其需求响应战略的一部分。 

近日，杜克能源公司的监管策略分析师Justin Orkney在Troy Cross的比特币、能源和环境播客上发表讲话时证实了这一消息。Orkney表示，该公司正在对比特币挖矿进行持续研究，在公司开始向客户部署挖矿功能之前，这些举措是决定如何让矿工开始在电网上工作的一部分。 

Orkney在播客上说，公司将把几种能源整合到微电网中，并在不同级别的矿工中进行测试，然后再发布关于挖矿的最终报告。该公司已经制定了一份需求响应报告，最初专注于比特币，并已经为几家比特币矿工提供了一个小型系统。（Watcher News）

title: Community poll: what are the best platforms and communities for web3 founders? (NFTmemo #6)
body:
### Where do web3 founders & creators hang? Calling on the community to add their two cents, so we can guide new creators and founders coming into the space.

I have taken a bit of a break from writing [NFT memos](https://www.mattbullish.com/) during the last few months focusing on [The Divergents](https://thedivergents.io/) (NFT collection), [Playgrid](https://playgrid.io/) (Steam for blockchain gaming), and attending conferences [NFC](https://www.nonfungibleconference.com/), [NFT.NYC](https://www.nft.nyc/) or [UTXO](https://utxo.cz/) (spoke at [NFT use cases panel](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=t4pS7o3UTAc&feature=emb_title)) evaluating my position in the NFT space. I however now plan to write more often as those who build during bear markets GMI.🚀

Instead of the usual NFT market analysis, this time I have decided to put together a list of communities and platforms that could be valuable for founders & digital entrepreneurs dedicated to building in the web3 space. As an NFT founder & advisor, I continuously search for supportive and resourceful collectives and platforms, that would help me in my web3 journey. Whether it be knowledge, tools, network, advice, or investment opportunities.

Due to the fast-paced environment, use of gate-keeping mechanisms, and fragmentation into a large number of communities, it may be hard for a newcomer but also an experienced participant in this ecosystem to have a good overview of these communities & platforms. I have therefore decided to **call on the web3 community** to throw two cents on what space was most helpful on their journey and why.

**Are you a creator or founder? I would be grateful for your opinion on what community or platform helped you on your journey (below or in a [new window](https://survey.typeform.com/to/eaBvGBH6)).**

[https://form.typeform.com/to/eaBvGBH6?typeform-embed-id=6973618512483848?display=iframe](https://form.typeform.com/to/eaBvGBH6?typeform-embed-id=6973618512483848?display=iframe)

Below I provide a list of communities, platforms, initiatives, DAOs, alpha chats, or IRL events that I know of and could be a good starting point. I am not in all of these, so I will always appreciate a second opinion. With a background focused mainly on NFTs, I may be leaning more towards NFT-focused spaces but will do my best to keep the list balanced.

### Communities

* **[Crypto Packaged Goods (CPG)](https://www.cryptopackagedgoods.com/)** - a collective that runs on two token-gated [Telegram chats](https://medium.com/@cryptopackagedgoods/cpg-telegram-entry-faq-4e27378370a8) - for [Genesis](https://market.cryptopackagedgoods.com/collections/0x837b40be9ce60c79b63d1356a5f9fcad721421ec) and [Pop](https://market.cryptopackagedgoods.com/collections/0x7eaa96d48380802a75ed6d74b91e2b30c3d474c1) NFT holders. CPG runs also its own incubator for POP members that opened applications on 23rd May and [consulting arm](https://www.cpg.consulting/) managed by CPG members. ([Public Telegram](https://t.me/+UM77pmRQDX40Mzkx))
* **[HUG](https://thehug.xyz/)** – is a community for collectors and web3 creators (HUGHub). Its original project is groupHUG - a creator accelerator program for post-mint NFT projects and up-and-coming 1/1 artists. The platform also runs an advisory program for early-stage pre-mint NFT projects. ([Discord](https://discord.gg/thehugxyz))
* **[Admit one](https://g.money/)** - is a private group created by [Gmoney](https://twitter.com/gmoneyNFT) for 1000 web3 enthusiasts, builders, and thought leaders token gated by [Admit One NFT](https://opensea.io/collection/admit-one). If you want to dig deeper here is the [manifesto](https://g.money/manifesto). ([Discord](https://discord.com/invite/gmoney))
* **[Midnight labs](https://www.joinmidnightlabs.com/)** - is a web3 collective for collectors and builders created by [Giancarlo](https://mobile.twitter.com/GiancarloChaux), who a few months ago [opened member applications](https://mobile.twitter.com/GiancarloChaux/status/1521923657462820864), which are currently frozen. You can [register](https://lhxlnynso6g.typeform.com/to/EPRmiltq) to get notified when the community reopens or try to get in by other means. ([Discord](https://discord.com/invite/vAxZapwM98))

*Whereas **[Probably Something](https://probablysomething.io/)** is a more product-oriented platform with a focus on creating software for NFT creators/collectors, the [token-gated](https://probablysomething.io/genesis) community around it could be worth a look. ([Discord](https://discord.com/invite/PuGcUH6vjH))*

### Platforms & initiatives

* **[Launch House](https://www.launchhouse.com/)** - a collective of social clubs [supported by a16z](https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20220201005377/en/Launch-House-Announces-12-Million-Series-A-Led-by-Andreessen-Horowitz) for founders, engineers, and investors. You can [apply](https://home.launchhouse.com/apply) to different cohorts based on your background - web3 founder residency (Launch House), Investor residency (Venture House), or Design house. They throw also IRL events and had some interesting ones during NFT.NYC.
* **[Forefront](https://forefront.market/)** – a launchpad for web3 founders that want to create a tokenized community that is behind [Terminal](https://www.terminal.co/community/featured/ffdao.eth) - a dashboard for DAOs. Part of Forefront is [Canon](https://forefront.market/canon) - a curated list of resources for digital communities, FF Labs which throws workshops and aims to execute the best ideas [submitted by the community](https://labs.forefront.club/). ([Discord](https://discord.gg/forefront))
* **[Angel Labs](https://www.angel-labs.io/)** - web3 accelerator from [Meta Angels NFT](https://www.metaangelsnft.com/) managed by [Cheryl Kellond](https://twitter.com/XXfounder) to support the next generation of NFT projects. The accelerator so far had only one cohort in early 2022. ([Discord](https://discord.com/invite/metaangels))

### **DAOs**

* **[Seed Club](https://www.seedclub.xyz/)** - social token incubator, that helps developers launch successful social tokens. Seed Club operates an accelerator to provide support to and bring together exciting new social impact projects, and has a portfolio consisting of SquiggleDAO, SongCamp, PartyDAO, and more. You can dig deeper by checking out their [intro article](https://medium.com/seedclub/introducing-seed-club-a-social-token-incubator-490c0474421b), [Notion](https://seedclub.notion.site/Seed-Club-Start-Here-b6f41decca25404dbc24e70dcb34dd2c), applying as a [community member](https://airtable.com/shrObZ3OEIoWLJaqm) or into their [next cohort](https://airtable.com/shr35dCkkt6Dxy7OY). ([Discord](https://discord.gg/ymQAr9sFKA))
* **[Orange DAO](https://www.orangedao.xyz/)** - a collective open only to YC alums supporting founders of crypto startups. Part of Orange DAO is also Orange Fund - a web3 venture fund. You can apply for funding [here](https://airtable.com/shrFujNXdLnzjY6RQ). If you are not YC alumni, you can [apply](https://airtable.com/shrihSLAIw9SiNmFd) to get informed if Orange DAO decides to extend their web3 community.
* **[LobsterDAO](https://github.com/lobster-dao/overview)** - an OG collective of DeFi & NFT degens and whales. Might be worth exploring for those with DeFi focus - [DeFi research chat](https://t.me/lobsters_chat), [general NFT chat](https://t.me/NFT_avenue), and [NFT-gated chat](https://telegram.me/collablandbot?start=VFBDI1RFTCNDT01NIy0xMDAxNTc3NzExMjQx), for which you need [LobsterDAO NFT](https://opensea.io/collection/lobsterdao).
* **[Friends With Benefits (FWB)](https://www.fwb.help/)** - a social DAO that describes itself as “a worldwide group of cultural creators, thinkers, and builders who convene digitally and IRL to collaboratively shape Web3´s future”, you can [apply to join here](https://www.fwb.help/join). I have attended their events, but still, have a pending application, so would be happy for an opinion on this one. ([Discord](https://discord.com/invite/3jCyswsKFn))

*For those looking for application designers and devs, **[VectorDAO](https://vectordao.com/)** could be of interest - a “collective of application designers & developers contributing work to crypto protocols in order to accelerate their mainstream adoption.“ You can apply to join [here](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScRbq4RvW6mTa_gjbpxGtE1JPUS4WqCmY7xkjJB3DitkbHqIg/viewform).*

### **Tools**

* **[Premint Creator key](https://creators.premint.xyz/)** - a good tool for NFT projects. As this tool is intended primarily for core teams, it is likely that at [Discord](https://discord.gg/byYaqc668D) you will run into and can DM other NFT founders. From my experience, it is way more likely they actually reply than writing them on Twitter. You can join without buying the key, but you will not be able to see hidden channels for collaborations etc.

### Alpha chats

* **[NFT Avenue](https://t.me/NFT_avenue)** - general NFT chat on Telegram created by [LobsterDAO](https://github.com/lobster-dao/overview) open to the public. One can occasionally catch there some interesting updates or projects.

### In real life (IRL) events

IRL events might be sometimes the best way to make meaningful relationships with founders and creators. A good overview of blockchain events you can find [here](https://www.bizzabo.com/blog/blockchain-events/).

* **[NFT.NYC (US)](https://www.nft.nyc/)** - NFT.NYC is the biggest global NFT event. From my experience, if you do not plan to catch speakers right after their talks, it is better to focus on the satellite events themselves. Most of the listed communities throw events on their own during the conference.
* **[Veecon (US)](https://veecon.co/)** – the first Veecon, a conference organized by Gary Vee, took a place on 19th-22nd May in Minneapolis. [Ticket NFTs](https://opensea.io/collection/veecon-tickets) for Veecon [were airdropped](https://blog.veefriends.com/veecon-2022-ticket-nfts-airdropped-e1ae5c4df27b) to Veefriends Series 1 holders as this is a core utility of the NFTs. I heard only good things from friends that have attended. Let´s see about next year.
* **[Non-Fungible Conference (EU](https://www.nonfungibleconference.com/))** – I consider NFC the biggest NFT event in Europe. It took a place in Lisbon on 4th-5th April. I met some founders there but to a limited extent. I share my experience from NFC [here](https://twitter.com/mattbullish/status/1512534125483372546). Next year NFC is taking place on [24th-25th May](https://www.linkedin.com/posts/nfcsummit_nfcsummit-activity-6948228948468113408-muzl?utm_source=linkedin_share&utm_medium=member_desktop_web).

### Wrap-up

I hope this list was helpful. If you do not see a community or platform in here that you have personal experience with and would recommend for web3 founders and creators, **please share it** **[here](https://survey.typeform.com/to/eaBvGBH6)** with the community.

I will be continuously updating this list and asking OGs, founders, devs & degens this very same question so that we can together provide a guide for navigating founders, creators, and digital entrepreneurs that decide to embark on the web3 journey.🚀

*Have an opinion on the above? Are you interested in/building something in NFT and web3 space? Drop a comment or message me on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/mattbullish) or [Telegram](https://t.me/mattbullish) and let’s chat.*

比特币行情分析（2022年7月5日）--------推特：比特币橙子Trader；（看我推特，不迷路；如果你关注我、转发我、点赞我和评论我，你会暴富，不信你试试！\~\~）

【昨日复盘】  美股因为美国独立纪念日假期休市一天，我们先来看看其他市场的走势，黄金在1800-1814之间震荡。美元指数一度跌破105关口，但最终收涨0.038%。欧股涨跌不一，德国DAX指数收跌0.31%。英国富时100指数收涨0.89%。

上周早报我们已经给大家分析过7月份的一些关键时间节点，今天我们重新再梳理下，然后大家可以根据这个时间节点进行必要的操作。首先是7月13日要公布6月份的CPI数据，所以这个时间前后如果是短线行为的话，可以进行必要的仓位减持，落袋为安是一个稳妥的交易行为。然后就是美联储加息会以时间，那就是7月28日凌晨2点，从目前的市场情况来看，加息75基点的可能性依然存在，美联储鲍威尔表示相较于加息过高而使经济陷入衰退的可能性，更担心无法遏制高通胀的风险。克利夫兰联储主席美斯特是如出一辙的想法，她说对美联储而言，错误地假设通胀将回到低水平，要比加息过多结果发现通胀预期仍锚定在较低水平更加有害。所以不能期待近期美联储会转为“鸽派“或软化立场。

还有个数据是美国二季度的GDP，这个时间是晚于美联储利率决议时间，7月28日晚上20:30，所以美联储利率会议的时候拿到了通胀数据但是没拿到GDP数据，那么这个时间前后市场又会变得比较敏感，为了高度的不确定性，这个时间前后大家应该有所警觉，必要的仓位管理还是非常重要。

货币研究机构 Ebury 市场策略主管 Matthew Ryan 表示，现在认为美联储不太可能再次加息 75 个基点，这至少对欧元和风险资产总体而言是温和的利好，尤其是考虑到市场预期在 7 月 27 日的 FOMC 会议上有约四分之三的几率以此幅度加息。随着食品和能源价格停止上涨，甚至在某些情况下有所下降，通胀可能在未来几个月有所缓解。

最近这段时间市场情绪低迷，毫无热点可言，所以操作上还是以场内热点项目为主，随着大盘短期相对稳定，一些优质山寨都会有不错的反弹机会，上周我就说反弹并未结束，因为市场已经不允许继续大跌的可能，所以势必会导致市场继续以盘整，反弹的走势为主。

Glassnode发布报告称，许多链上和市场的表现指标已经达到了历史上和统计学上的显著低点。对于目前的比特币熊市状况，报告指出，比特币价格已经跌至历史前高的73.3%，这与以往熊市低点的上限相吻合。从顶部到底部的持续时间在227天到435天之间，取决于熊市开始的位置。低于200日均线的偏差非常大，只有2%的交易日比现在表现得更糟糕。在统计的基础上，市场已经实现了历史上最大的月度跌幅。这得到了卖出行为的支持，这种行为锁定了荒谬得相对损失，这些损失是如此之大，以至于只有3.5%的历史交易日出现过更大的资本外流。亏损与盈利的转移量之间的比率已达到历史最高水平，是深受困扰的投资者的代名词。

据CryptoSlam数据，NFT市场月销售额在12个月内首次跌破10亿美元。据分析，加密货币价格暴跌是NFT销售不佳的部分原因，但6月份的每月独立买家也从1月份超过100万的高位下降了近50%，现在自2021年7月以来首次低于60万。 另一个明显的迹象是，Bored Ape Yacht Club（最大的NFT收藏品之一）地板价从2021年6月中旬一年多以来首次跌破100,000美元，跌至86,277美元的低点。这比5月底超过400,000美元的高点下跌了近80%。

美国男演员 Kevin Hart 推出的 NFT Kevin Hart Nation 开启预售 NFT 于 7 月 6 日开启预售；Filecoin 网络预计 7 月 6 日 14:00 升级到 v16 版本，这是 Lotus 的一个强制升级发布版本，代号是 Skyr 升级。Skyr 升级引入了六项内容。以太坊 Layer 2 网络 Optimism 第二轮治理提案投票于北京时间 7 月 7 日 3:00 结束，本轮被批准就 OP 代币分配进行投票的项目包括了 ParaSwap、Optimistic Railway、dForce、GYSR、Mean Finance、Raptor、Balancer 与 BeethovenX、Summa、WardenSwap、Pickle Financ。此外，Ooki Protocol、Infinity Wallet、Beefy、0xHabitat、Thales 也已提交提案但目前未获得明确批准。 此前结束的第一轮治理提案投票中，共有 25 个项目的提案获得了通过，总计将向这 25 个项目分配 3600 万枚 OP 代币；FTX 将于北京时间 7 月 8 日 21:00 开启 CRIPCO 代币 IP3 预售，CRIPCO 是一个 IP 3.0 生态枢纽，旨在建立一个 NFT 生态系统，使每个人都可以通过 NFT 工具进行二次创作。此外，用户还可以在 CRIPCO 上便利地买卖 NFT。 CRIPCO 是一个 NFT 交易市场和平台，个人和企业都能在此为其 NFT 赋值。

没事来我们电报群吧，这里帅哥，美女多，代码也多，话题也多，机会多多，还可以防失联。（电报群搜索：橙子的朋友们）

【比特币行情分析】  比特币在6月26日反弹到最高21888之后开始继续下跌，到现在已经有1周多的时间，这一周的时间持续下跌不断的测试支撑位，到目前位置，二次测试底部支撑的位置在18000附近，这个信号其实很明显，如果说7月4日凌晨4点的大阳线是假信号的话，昨天下午16点的这根大阳线就是确定性信号，所以在CPI公布之前这段时间，都可以理解为反弹持续，然后我们等CPI公布之后再根据实际情况进行判断。

4小时级别，二次试探测试支撑基本确立，后市主要以调整反弹为主，上方阻力28000附近，下方支撑18000-19000这个区间。操作上建议大家以优质山寨为主，然后7月关键时间节点注意落袋为安。

【风险提醒】 数字资产波动较大，风险极高，请谨慎参与，杜绝满仓梭哈，拒绝贷款杠杆；

title: 隐私公链Espresso Systems从WINDOWS安装到交互保姆级教程
body:
大家好，我是来自[NewAirDropS 社区](https://bit.ly/3xkxqjH) 的 [撸大发](https://twitter.com/coeli000)。

今天介绍 的是一个非常牛逼的隐私链项目——Espresso Systems。

当然项目还非常早期，测试过程比较复杂，大家要有心理准备，但我最喜欢挑战有难度的任务，所以开始吧。

我使用的是WINDOWS10 64位操作系统，一点一点摸索吧。

## 第一步：安装WSL

这一步就是在WINDOWS上安装一个UBUNTU虚拟机

### 1.在D盘下新建一个文件夹

我命名为：

TestDocker

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/tEVmeMn3xGMGSmJ_dPVkP.png?height=342&width=331)

现在这个文件夹在系统中的目录地址就是：

D:\\TestDocker

这个要记住，后面需要用到。

### 2.打开POWERSHELL

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/-HTnBbLcWUtkhALPWzE05.png?height=1689&width=1834)

这时会出现 一个弹出对话框，要求确认是否真的要“以管理员身份运行”PowerShell

点击“是”之后进入下面的界面：

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/cCkX3GSJm6TsjARVbKKJI.png?height=1848&width=2241)

现在我们准备安装WSL

### 3.输入命令安装WSL

在PowerShell窗口中输入下面的命令

wsl --install

如图：

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/m645jkKnN4xuYvCgHCFBq.png?height=1837&width=2219)

输入命令完成后，要按键盘上的 回车键

会看到安装进度：

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/8jv5F2wDNvzpEbz0WX_Py.png?height=1846&width=2240)

需要安装一系列部件，所以需要一些时间，需要耐心等待，见下图的进度指示：

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/bGgQyoCcB-p4Ajqfh_8VS.png?height=1603&width=2202)

直到出现下面的提示，才安装完成了wsl.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/pSzz9qIQH-9psnyMTU24V.png?height=1824&width=2211)

这时，我们需要重新启动电脑。

### 4.重新启动电脑

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/J4damKwY6D8oZY_eAs0Qh.png?height=511&width=633)

### 5.继续安装UBUNtu虚拟机

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Gw_1sV1FObYQ4WbF9j7pv.png?height=1293&width=2455)

重新启动后，系统 会自动继续安装UBUNTU虚拟机，我们要耐心等待安装 完成

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/K0U8tYQC1K36onRIH5vh5.png?height=1275&width=2448)

### 6.设置UBUNTU虚拟机的用户名和密码

如上图所示，我们需要设置自己的用户名和密码：

先输入用户名，然后按回车键，下图是我的输入：

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/GvAvFCnwnO-UI87PnptKl.png?height=1275&width=2448)

然后，我们要设置密码：（密码输入后也要按回车）

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/2w-m5_PZBJU8kAkPOMBs-.png?height=1279&width=2457)

再输入一遍密码，并按回车

就进入了下面的界面。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/-B90YpgAog-zGmmNXC0Nb.png?height=1275&width=2448)

如果出现上图的界面，那就是成功了，但是如果出现下面的界面，那就是失败了：

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/EYlMVyY8E1KiMyQBYVGax.png?height=883&width=1666)

这时，我们需要按官方文档指示去处理：

[官方文档链接](https://github.com/microsoft/WSL/issues/4194)：

[https://github.com/microsoft/WSL/issues/4194](https://github.com/microsoft/WSL/issues/4194)

## 第二步：安装DOCKER

现在开始安装DOCKER

### 1.进入官方网站

[https://www.docker.com/](https://www.docker.com/)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/pLNyIrXTXic0f1lSeoc8i.png?height=1791&width=3718)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/pKym8WohhmxugbsokWyNC.png?height=1550&width=1423)

等待下载完成后，开始安装 

### 2.安装DOCKER

首先找到下载的安装包：

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/aZLtx6et6f_0Ppxwb71GR.png?height=385&width=327)

双击安装

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/9TEih5mZD7r-ZyQ1R7z6o.png?height=1216&width=1782)

根据网络速度的不同，安装过程可能需要一些时间，一定要耐心等待，否则就需要完全卸载DOCKER再重新安装 ，比较麻烦。

下图是安装过程：

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/DYirp3zfVA9IFhAbo4lPm.png?height=1226&width=1774)

耐心等待安装完成后，是这样子的：

### 🏧 **Solana 链上应用渐成黑客「提款机」，该如何应对？**

( [原文链接](https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/u6SQ6iDLVUUalya5rIeBJw) ）

> **Dmitry Mishunin（HashEx 创始人）:** 要构建**安全的 DeFi 协议**，首先要有经验丰富的区块链开发人员，应该有一个专业的团队领导，具有构建去中心化应用程序的技能，同时，使用安**全代码库**进行开发也是明智之举，有时，与具有最新代码库的库相比，不怎么最新的库可能是**最安全的选择**。【原文为英文】 （ [来源](https://cointelegraph.com/news/the-development-of-blockchain-industry-and-how-to-defend-against-attacks-on-defi) ）

### ⤴️ **一文读懂以太坊新升级方案 Danksharding：设计思路、意义及未来展望**

( [原文链接](https://mirror.xyz/0x0d8c792f881c08420859FCCDA79B3C90d0A6a4cF/TbLbRI1VcDZYxkHJOBhB319oaYxnV5_DmqXl6xLfcWM) ）

> **wagyuu｜和牛:** 个人感觉 **Proto-danksharding** 的提出更像在**引导未来开发者**采用类似 Celestia 的**数据可用性层**，而以太坊只提供**短期内的保障**。 （ [来源](https://twitter.com/FriedWagyuu/status/1543636020172062720) ）

> **Mtyl:** Danksharding 的**核心设计思路**是通过 **RS 编码和 KZG 承诺**，解决了**数据可用性问题**，实现了网络**验证的去中心化**；通过**出块者-打包者分离（PBS）**，解决 **MEV 问题**；通过**抗审查清单（Crlist）**，解决了**抗审查**问题。 （ [来源](https://mirror.xyz/0x0d8c792f881c08420859FCCDA79B3C90d0A6a4cF/TbLbRI1VcDZYxkHJOBhB319oaYxnV5_DmqXl6xLfcWM) ）

### 🧑‍⚖️ **加密律师如何看待三箭资本破产清算事件？**

( [原文链接](https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/4M-n5QD9m1U4EWa45eqL0g) ）

> **gonbe:** 巨鲸投资人如何更好地减少清算损失：1）**先进先出**。会对资产池造成资金短缺影响的提款被视为按照资产存入的顺序移除资产。因此，**亏空损失**将不成比例地分配给**最早的储户**，并由他们承担；2）**全局平摊**。每次从资金池中提款都被**单独考虑**。每次从池中提款将被视为整体池**按比例减少**，除非它可以单独归因于一个特定的存款人或来源。【原文为英文】 （ [来源](https://twitter.com/gonbegood/status/1542891312013316102) ）

> **wassielawyer:** 3AC 在英属维尔京群岛的清算申请似乎有两份。一份申请是由 3AC 自己提出的清算申请，而另一份申请是由 3AC 的债权人提出的**临时清算申请**。清算是**指定清算人**变现公司所有资产并将其分配给债权人的地方。这是公司的终结。而**临时清算**通常是为了保全公司的资产。令我吃惊的是，清算令来得如此之快，现在看来，它发生得如此之快的原因 是**3AC 自己申请清算**！【原文为英文】 （ [来源](https://twitter.com/wassielawyer/status/1543238225338454016) ）

### 🏙️【英文长推】简析代币化现实世界资产的机遇及挑战

( [原文链接](https://twitter.com/ChainLinkGod/status/1543323712325267456) ）

## 第三届Eden官方选举拉开帷幕

![](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/0\*ZGq4sz1KIkAEeJZz)

[第三届Eden官方选举](https://genesis.eden.eoscommunity.org/election)将于7月9日举行，我们鼓励所有人参与其中，帮助引领EOS的下一个真正民主时代。 凭借Eden国库中近20万枚EOS ，以及[Daniel Larimer](https://twitter.com/bytemaster7)在《[更平等的动物](https://moreequalanimals.com/posts/book-launch)》一书中概述的优雅ƒractal共识流程，即将举行的Eden选举提供了绝佳机会，能够在EOS构建[公共基础产品](https://eosnetwork.com/zh/blog/creating-positive-sum-games-for-public-goods-on-eos/)筹集资金。

自从4月[第二届Eden官方选举](https://youtu.be/1m1CWfFwuYw?t=9647)和新任首席代表[首次发声](https://youtu.be/1m1CWfFwuYw?t=9647)以来， Eden社区已经取得了一些令人兴奋的进展。EOS网络基金会首席执行官[Yves La Rose](https://eosnetwork.com/zh/%e5%85%b3%e4%ba%8e/)在上次选举中强调， Eden代表需要以[大胆的行动](https://youtu.be/AweOIPNyEnw?t=16225)迅速迭代，我们祝贺首席代表[Brock Pierce](https://genesis.eden.eoscommunity.org/members/brockpierce1)、[Chuck MacDonald](https://genesis.eden.eoscommunity.org/members/chkmacdonald)、[Edgar Fernandez](https://genesis.eden.eoscommunity.org/members/costaricamae)、[Gracie Lau](https://genesis.eden.eoscommunity.org/members/gracielau.gm)和[Michael O’Sullivan](https://genesis.eden.eoscommunity.org/members/bywire.com)为推动Eden的未来而采取的果断行动。

在首席代表的众多成就中，Eden通过正式将[Eden账户](https://bloks.io/account/eden#keys)的[active权限](https://bloks.io/account/genesis.eden#keys)移交给首席代表，获得了很大程度的独立性。 通过首席代表、[ƒractally](https://fractally.com/)前开发人员、[EOS网络基金会](https://eosnetwork.com/zh/%e5%85%b3%e4%ba%8e/)和[EOS DAO](https://eosnetwork.com/zh/%e7%a4%be%e5%8c%ba/)之间的合作，这种史无前例的[移交](https://bloks.io/msig/costaricamae/setedenkeys1)成为可能。

[https://twitter.com/helios_rising_/status/1542559318750396417?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw%7Ctwcamp%5Etweetembed%7Ctwterm%5E1542559318750396417%7Ctwgr%5E%7Ctwcon%5Es1_c10&ref_url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.embedly.com%2Fwidgets%2Fmedia.html%3Ftype%3Dtext2Fhtmlkey%3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07schema%3Dtwitterurl%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Ftwitter.com%2Fhelios_rising_%2Fstatus%2F1542559318750396417image%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Fi.embed.ly%2F1%2Fimage3Furl3Dhttps253A252F252Fabs.twimg.com252Ferrors252Flogo46x38.png26key3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07](https://twitter.com/helios_rising_/status/1542559318750396417?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw%7Ctwcamp%5Etweetembed%7Ctwterm%5E1542559318750396417%7Ctwgr%5E%7Ctwcon%5Es1_c10&ref_url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.embedly.com%2Fwidgets%2Fmedia.html%3Ftype%3Dtext2Fhtmlkey%3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07schema%3Dtwitterurl%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Ftwitter.com%2Fhelios_rising_%2Fstatus%2F1542559318750396417image%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Fi.embed.ly%2F1%2Fimage3Furl3Dhttps253A252F252Fabs.twimg.com252Ferrors252Flogo46x38.png26key3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07)

如上所述，[第三届Eden官方选举](https://genesis.eden.eoscommunity.org/election)选举将于UTC时间[7月9日13:00](https://twitter.com/NovaCryptoLTD/status/1543249320681639937)（北京时间7月9日21:00）举行，我们鼓励大家参与。 请注意，由于[技术原因](https://t.me/EdenOSinfo/39417)，[Eden会员门户网站](https://genesis.eden.eoscommunity.org/election)上的日期可能尚未更新，Eden社区正在努力更新代码以显示正确的日期。

## Pomelo第三季即启动：Grant Collectible Packs发布

![](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/0\*Z-geqIzYKCUwJLnl)

Pomelo第3季的NFT庆祝活动正在进行中！Pomelo团队本周投放了[Grant收藏卡包](https://twitter.com/PomeloGrants/status/1541390889100140545)，并发布了《[Pomelo第3季NFT冒险指南](https://medium.com/@PomeloGrants/your-guide-to-the-pomelo-season-3-nft-adventure-de780edfa380)》。阅读本文即可了解加入Pomelo第3季NFT庆祝活动所需的所有内容细节，包括如何购买「out of this world」NFT、自定义您的Pomelo.io个人资料图片、如何获得成就奖以及如何在混合火箭药水后将火箭发射到外太空 ！

另外，Pomelo团队还投放了[Pomelo Grant收藏卡包](https://twitter.com/PomeloGrants/status/1541390889100140545)系列，这是一个令人兴奋的新NFT系列，您可以在其中收集[Pomelo第2季](https://medium.com/@PomeloGrants/pomelo-season-2-analysis-matching-pool-distribution-98af766162f2)的[前20名资助](https://medium.com/@PomeloGrants/pomelo-season-2-analysis-matching-pool-distribution-98af766162f2#18ef)相关内容，并将它们与Carbon混合，制造嵌入二次众筹神奇能量的强大火箭药水！

您现在可以通过[harvest.pomelo.io](https://harvest.pomelo.io/)或[AtomicHub](https://eos.atomichub.io/drops/139)购买这两种NFT来加入冒险活动，然后按照[指南](https://medium.com/@PomeloGrants/your-guide-to-the-pomelo-season-3-nft-adventure-de780edfa380)中的说明创建您的火箭药水。

所有通过Carbon NFT和Grant 收藏卡包销售所筹集的资金，将作为Pomelo第三季的匹配池资金捐出，以促进EOS生态系统的[公共基础产品](https://medium.com/@EOSNetworkFoundation/eos%E5%9F%BA%E9%87%91%E4%BC%9A%E6%90%BA%E6%89%8Bpomelo-%E5%BB%BA%E8%AE%BE%E5%85%AC%E5%85%B1%E5%9F%BA%E7%A1%80-%E6%BF%80%E5%8F%91%E7%BD%91%E7%BB%9C%E4%BB%B7%E5%80%BC-b5b35c3ee7de)的发展。

![](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/0\*TbO68O-agQr1yNm0)

无论您是[Pomelo](https://pomelo.io/grants/)的新成员，还是前两个赛季经验丰富的老手，现在都是参与其中探索新世界促进公共基础产品开发的最佳时机。 第3季的Pomelo资助申请将于[7月19日](https://medium.com/@PomeloGrants/let-the-pomelo-season-3-festivities-begin-69f18d6a0d34#ad82)开放，并将于7月27日开放个人贡献者捐赠。

## Upland与波尔图足球俱乐部达成合作

![](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/0\*MSMlaQcdGQZ_ds-5)

欢迎[波尔图足球俱乐部](https://twitter.com/EosNFoundation/status/1542505920432951296)加入[Upland 元宇宙](https://twitter.com/UplandMe/status/1542136768752783363)！

通过这一历史性的合作，葡萄牙顶级俱乐部[波尔图足球俱乐部](https://twitter.com/FCPorto/status/1542138930920931329)将成为第一个建立虚拟体育场，并且能够创建可收集的球队和球员NFT的足球队。在与Upland合作之后，[波尔图足球俱乐部](https://twitter.com/FCPorto/status/1542138930920931329)将通过数字体育资产等方式为球迷提供创新的参与机会!

[https://twitter.com/EosNFoundation/status/1542505920432951296?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw%7Ctwcamp%5Etweetembed%7Ctwterm%5E1542505920432951296%7Ctwgr%5E%7Ctwcon%5Es1_c10&ref_url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.embedly.com%2Fwidgets%2Fmedia.html%3Ftype%3Dtext2Fhtmlkey%3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07schema%3Dtwitterurl%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Ftwitter.com%2Feosnfoundation%2Fstatus%2F1542505920432951296image%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Fi.embed.ly%2F1%2Fimage3Furl3Dhttps253A252F252Fabs.twimg.com252Ferrors252Flogo46x38.png26key3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07](https://twitter.com/EosNFoundation/status/1542505920432951296?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw%7Ctwcamp%5Etweetembed%7Ctwterm%5E1542505920432951296%7Ctwgr%5E%7Ctwcon%5Es1_c10&ref_url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.embedly.com%2Fwidgets%2Fmedia.html%3Ftype%3Dtext2Fhtmlkey%3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07schema%3Dtwitterurl%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Ftwitter.com%2Feosnfoundation%2Fstatus%2F1542505920432951296image%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Fi.embed.ly%2F1%2Fimage3Furl3Dhttps253A252F252Fabs.twimg.com252Ferrors252Flogo46x38.png26key3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07)

我们为Upland、波尔图足球俱乐部以及EOS上蓬勃发展的元宇宙玩家和创作者社区感到自豪。 对于那些不熟悉的人来说，[Upland](https://twitter.com/UplandMe)是一个快速增长的资产交易元宇宙，它能够与现实世界的地址相连接，并基于EOS构建。您可以在新闻稿中了解Upland与[波尔图足球俱乐部](https://twitter.com/FCPorto/status/1542138930920931329)令人[激动的合作](https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20220629005234/en/FC-Porto-is-the-First-European-Football-Club-to-Enter-into-the-Metaverse-with-Upland-Agreement?utm_campaign=shareaholic&utm_medium=twitter&utm_source=socialnetwork)，并从他们设计精美的[网站](https://www.upland.me/)、[介绍视频](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ERNn35_iqtE)和[详细文档](https://www.upland.me/guides-and-tutorials/introduction)中了解有关Upland的更多信息。

[https://twitter.com/BigBeardSamurai/status/1542300795693142018?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw%7Ctwcamp%5Etweetembed%7Ctwterm%5E1542300795693142018%7Ctwgr%5E%7Ctwcon%5Es1_c10&ref_url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.embedly.com%2Fwidgets%2Fmedia.html%3Ftype%3Dtext2Fhtmlkey%3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07schema%3Dtwitterurl%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Ftwitter.com%2Fbigbeardsamurai%2Fstatus%2F1542300795693142018image%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Fi.embed.ly%2F1%2Fimage3Furl3Dhttps253A252F252Fabs.twimg.com252Ferrors252Flogo46x38.png26key3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07](https://twitter.com/BigBeardSamurai/status/1542300795693142018?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw%7Ctwcamp%5Etweetembed%7Ctwterm%5E1542300795693142018%7Ctwgr%5E%7Ctwcon%5Es1_c10&ref_url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.embedly.com%2Fwidgets%2Fmedia.html%3Ftype%3Dtext2Fhtmlkey%3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07schema%3Dtwitterurl%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Ftwitter.com%2Fbigbeardsamurai%2Fstatus%2F1542300795693142018image%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Fi.embed.ly%2F1%2Fimage3Furl3Dhttps253A252F252Fabs.twimg.com252Ferrors252Flogo46x38.png26key3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07)

借助[EOS的力量](https://eosnetwork.com/zh/%e6%8a%80%e6%9c%af/)，Upland玩家已经在洛杉矶、旧金山、布朗克斯、芝加哥、新奥尔良和曼哈顿等虚拟城市购买了[超过300万个NFT](https://twitter.com/DirkLueth/status/1536415930166546432)，价值数百万美元。 您可以在[EOS Hot Sauce第154期 ](https://youtu.be/grlO10TxeSE?t=1244)和我们[5月9日的周报](https://eosnetwork.com/zh/blog/everything-eos-weekly-report-may-9th/)中，了解EOS如何为Upland开发提供动力的更多信息。

## EOS黑客松更多细节披露

[https://youtu.be/OMi_2eHZY0M](https://youtu.be/OMi_2eHZY0M)

请继续关注即将到来的黑客马拉松的更多细节。 正如Chris在[围炉谈话](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=epOmRqmHefk&list=PLRK9ZLYOWiXNychJ9fb830HONYVZ_7BlP&index=3&t=4005s)中提到的那样，这次黑客马拉松将对有伟大想法的技术和非技术创作者开放，他们可以用EOS来构建相关内容。如果您有兴趣参与或帮助组织此活动，请加入[EOS Discord](https://discord.com/channels/892385699616153600/943618719756718100/956408221831168030)的Hackathon Planning频道，如有任何问题或意见，请随时与我们联系。

## TrustEVM可成为以太坊扩容方案：引发中文社区广泛讨论

[https://twitter.com/BigBeardSamurai/status/1542547935883366402?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw%7Ctwcamp%5Etweetembed%7Ctwterm%5E1542547935883366402%7Ctwgr%5E%7Ctwcon%5Es1_c10&ref_url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.embedly.com%2Fwidgets%2Fmedia.html%3Ftype%3Dtext2Fhtmlkey%3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07schema%3Dtwitterurl%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Ftwitter.com%2Fbigbeardsamurai%2Fstatus%2F1542547935883366402image%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Fi.embed.ly%2F1%2Fimage3Furl3Dhttps253A252F252Fabs.twimg.com252Ferrors252Flogo46x38.png26key3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07](https://twitter.com/BigBeardSamurai/status/1542547935883366402?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw%7Ctwcamp%5Etweetembed%7Ctwterm%5E1542547935883366402%7Ctwgr%5E%7Ctwcon%5Es1_c10&ref_url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.embedly.com%2Fwidgets%2Fmedia.html%3Ftype%3Dtext2Fhtmlkey%3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07schema%3Dtwitterurl%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Ftwitter.com%2Fbigbeardsamurai%2Fstatus%2F1542547935883366402image%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Fi.embed.ly%2F1%2Fimage3Furl3Dhttps253A252F252Fabs.twimg.com252Ferrors252Flogo46x38.png26key3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07)

一份摩根士丹利报告表示：转向 PoS 并不能解决以太坊的扩容问题。EOS 网络基金会创始人和首席执行官 Yves La Rose 在社交媒体转发此条报告并表示：

合并 (The Merge) 无助于解决以太坊扩容问题，但 EOS 可以，Trust EVM推出后，以太坊终于有了一个可行的扩容解决方案。

由于近日以太坊最受欢迎的Layer 2扩容方案Arbitrum出现网络拥堵及Gas高昂问题，以太坊性能问题再次成为热议话题，而Yves关于Trust EVM可以成为以太坊可行L2扩容方案这一观点，不仅吸引如[区块律动](https://www.theblockbeats.info/flash/90327)、[星球日报](https://www.odaily.news/newsflash/290808)、[链捕手](https://www.chaincatcher.com/article/2076051)、[PANews](https://www.panewslab.com/zh/sqarticledetails/ys8gl4qm.html)、[MarsBit](https://news.marsbit.co/flash/20220701121626952194.html)、[金色财经](https://www.jinse.com/lives/307658.html)等中国多家区块链媒体的报道，也在中文社区引发广泛热议，让更多人知道了Trust EVM的性能优势。

此前，Yves La Rose 曾在社交媒体表示：EOS 一直是高性能、低成本的 L1 区块链网络。脱离 Block.one 桎梏之后，EOS 社区有充分资金与人才，正在重新焕发活力卷土重来。EOS 并不旨在成为「以太坊杀手」，EOS 推出的 Trust EVM 或将成为以太坊首选的 L2 解决方案。

Trust EVM 是官方 EOS EVM 平台，具有确定性的 Gas 计算、指令集级别的 EVM 兼容性以及完全的 RPC 兼容等特性并即将登陆 EOS 主网。

## 关于EOS

EOS网络是区块链3.0时代的典范之作，由EOS VM提供支持。EOS VM是一个低延迟、高性能和可扩展的WebAssembly引擎，能够近乎无感的实现确定性交易执行。EOS网络专为Web 3设计，致力于实现最佳的Web 3用户和开发人员体验。EOS是EOSIO协议的旗舰区块链和金融中心，并通过EOS网络基金会（ENF）作为多链协作和发展公共基础产品的工具，进一步完善基础设施，驱动EOS快速发展。

## EOS网络基金会

EOS网络基金会是一个非营利性的组织，旨在倾听社区声音、传达社区意愿并扶持社区优质项目发展，成为EOS社区的信息共享桥梁，并为EOS生态提供资金、技术、运营、未来规划、生态构建等关键基础设施支持，进一步发挥EOS作为世界速度最快的治理型区块链的全部潜力。

title: Everything EOS周报第二十六期 | 2022年7月4日
body:
![](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1\*oNdZFIiVBojeD7XJK8GNZA.png)

欢迎来到 Everything EOS 周报，本期内容汇总了 EOS 生态6月27日 — 7 月03日发生的大事件。

Everything EOS周报涵盖英语、中文和韩语 EOS 社区的消息。我们将持续发布更新来自世界各地的 EOS 生态系统新闻。Everything EOS 周报是了解世界各地 EOS 最新消息的最佳方式。EOS 生态大小新鲜事，一起来看看吧！

> **本周的主要内容包括：**

* Vitalik Buterin赞赏EOS引发广泛热议
* 第三届Eden官方选举拉开帷幕
* Pomelo第三季即启动：Grant Collectible Packs发布
* Upland与波尔图足球俱乐部达成合作
* EOS黑客松更多计划披露
* 韩国头部交易所Bithumb启动EOS质押奖励
* Recover+如何帮助减轻DeFi风险
* Mandel升级工作持续推进中
* EOS中文社区开展GameFi主题茶话会
* TrustEVM可成为以太坊扩容方案：引发中文社区广泛讨论
* EOS社区不容错过的热点活动

## Vitalik Buterin赞赏EOS引发广泛热议

![](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/0\*H9cOiur2ighCsQhk)

本周，由于[以太坊](https://ethereum.org/en/)创始人[Vitalik Buterin](https://twitter.com/VitalikButerin/status/1541452416331268096)在推特上称赞EOS的高性能和专业的顶级软件开发人员团队，EOS在媒体参与和社区增长方面获得了巨大推动力！

Vitalik Buterin是一位杰出的建设者和有远见的创新者，他被视为Web3领域最杰出的思想领袖之一。Vitalik在以太坊的工作为全人类创造了巨大的利益，他的思想为世界上许多最伟大的思想家提供了无限的灵感。数以百万计的天才创造者密切关注Vitalik的[博客](https://vitalik.ca/)、[播客](https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=vitalik+lex+fridman)和[推特](https://twitter.com/VitalikButerin)，学习有关各种主题的深刻见解，包括[区块链设计](https://vitalik.ca/general/2022/02/28/complexity.html)、[治理](https://vitalik.ca/general/2021/08/16/voting3.html)和[life extension](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cZYNADOHhVY)。

在EOS中，Vitalik的文章《[一种关于资助公共基础产品的灵活设计](https://arxiv.org/pdf/1809.06421.pdf)》提出了二次众筹概念，也助力了EOS生态二次众筹平台 [Pomelo ](https://pomelo.io/about/)的发展，为EOS创建[正和游戏](https://eosnetwork.com/zh/blog/creating-positive-sum-games-for-public-goods-on-eos/)铺平了道路。除了提及的这一点，Vitalik的其他贡献同样是不可估量的，他的工作启发了EOS社区的无数领袖级人物，以更有效地方式为所有人创造积极的全球变革！

[https://twitter.com/VitalikButerin/status/1541452416331268096?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw%7Ctwcamp%5Etweetembed%7Ctwterm%5E1541452416331268096%7Ctwgr%5E%7Ctwcon%5Es1_c10&ref_url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.embedly.com%2Fwidgets%2Fmedia.html%3Ftype%3Dtext2Fhtmlkey%3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07schema%3Dtwitterurl%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Ftwitter.com%2Fvitalikbuterin%2Fstatus%2F1541452416331268096image%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Fi.embed.ly%2F1%2Fimage3Furl3Dhttps253A252F252Fabs.twimg.com252Ferrors252Flogo46x38.png26key3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07](https://twitter.com/VitalikButerin/status/1541452416331268096?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw%7Ctwcamp%5Etweetembed%7Ctwterm%5E1541452416331268096%7Ctwgr%5E%7Ctwcon%5Es1_c10&ref_url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.embedly.com%2Fwidgets%2Fmedia.html%3Ftype%3Dtext2Fhtmlkey%3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07schema%3Dtwitterurl%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Ftwitter.com%2Fvitalikbuterin%2Fstatus%2F1541452416331268096image%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Fi.embed.ly%2F1%2Fimage3Furl3Dhttps253A252F252Fabs.twimg.com252Ferrors252Flogo46x38.png26key3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07)

Vitalik对于EOS的赞赏吸引了大量人员关注EOS，激发了无数Web3[影响者](https://twitter.com/JRNYcrypto/status/1541497329747775488)和[媒体](https://cryptoslate.com/confusion-reigns-as-vitalik-buterin-praises-eos-while-slamming-ethereum/)对EOS进行更多了解并积极分享他们的想法。 EOS社区对Vitalik深表感谢，并完美地抓住了这个机会，帮助大家了解EOS的惊人进步和好处。

[EOS网络基金会](https://eosnetwork.com/zh/%e5%85%b3%e4%ba%8e/)首席执行官[Yves La Rose](https://eosnetwork.com/zh/%e5%85%b3%e4%ba%8e/)率先在推特上引用了Vitalik的赞赏，并为所有需要了解的人[简要描述](https://twitter.com/BigBeardSamurai/status/1541507686872793089)了EOS即将上演的精彩复出故事。

Yves首先陈述了EOS是[世界上性能最强的区块链](https://twitter.com/BigBeardSamurai/status/1541507689846562821)的事实，并回应了Vitalik[之前对Block.one的担忧](https://twitter.com/BigBeardSamurai/status/1541507692631658498)，在[5月23日的周报中](https://eosnetwork.com/zh/blog/everything-eos-weekly-report-may-23rd/)，我们已经明确的将Block.one介绍为不称职的前开发者。自去年[EOS网络基金会](https://eosnetwork.com/zh/%e5%85%b3%e4%ba%8e/)成立以来，在我们的领导下，EOS现在吸引了许多世界上最有才华的开发者加入我们，包括我们新聘请的[工程总监](https://eosnetwork.com/zh/blog/architects-of-consensus-eos-gets-antifragile-with-areg-hayrapetian/)、[开发者关系总监](https://eosnetwork.com/zh/blog/enf%e5%ae%a3%e5%b8%83%e6%96%b0%e4%bb%bb%e5%bc%80%e5%8f%91%e8%80%85%e5%85%b3%e7%b3%bb%e6%80%bb%e7%9b%91%ef%bc%9a%e4%b8%baeos%e5%bc%80%e5%8f%91%e6%b3%a8%e5%85%a5%e6%b4%bb%e5%8a%9b%ef%bc%8c%e4%bf%9d/)、[正在招募](https://twitter.com/BigBeardSamurai/status/1537965004913143808)的[世界级开发公司](https://eosnetwork.com/zh/blog/eos-network-foundation-enlists-oci-to-implement-transaction-lifecycle-features-on-eos/)，以及[成就惊人](https://twitter.com/BigBeardSamurai/status/1539774074326552576)的[EOSIO高级工程师](https://eosnetwork.com/zh/blog/securing-talent-for-the-eos-network/)。

[https://twitter.com/BigBeardSamurai/status/1541507686872793089?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw%7Ctwcamp%5Etweetembed%7Ctwterm%5E1541507686872793089%7Ctwgr%5E%7Ctwcon%5Es1_c10&ref_url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.embedly.com%2Fwidgets%2Fmedia.html%3Ftype%3Dtext2Fhtmlkey%3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07schema%3Dtwitterurl%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Ftwitter.com%2Fbigbeardsamurai%2Fstatus%2F1541507686872793089image%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Fi.embed.ly%2F1%2Fimage3Furl3Dhttps253A252F252Fabs.twimg.com252Ferrors252Flogo46x38.png26key3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07](https://twitter.com/BigBeardSamurai/status/1541507686872793089?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw%7Ctwcamp%5Etweetembed%7Ctwterm%5E1541507686872793089%7Ctwgr%5E%7Ctwcon%5Es1_c10&ref_url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.embedly.com%2Fwidgets%2Fmedia.html%3Ftype%3Dtext2Fhtmlkey%3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07schema%3Dtwitterurl%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Ftwitter.com%2Fbigbeardsamurai%2Fstatus%2F1541507686872793089image%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Fi.embed.ly%2F1%2Fimage3Furl3Dhttps253A252F252Fabs.twimg.com252Ferrors252Flogo46x38.png26key3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07)

Yves强调了[EOSIO 联盟](https://twitter.com/BigBeardSamurai/status/1541507700420395009)的巨大进展，您可以在我们的[博客](https://eosnetwork.com/zh/blog/category/eosio-coalition-zh/)和[播放列表](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLRK9ZLYOWiXMZK_151fQLi-7RPsCkj8ge)中了解更多信息。 他还强调了我们核心软件的快速创新，您可以在我们的 [Mandel 播放列表](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLRK9ZLYOWiXOs7XOx3fjueBvieRtQCsi1)、[每周摘要](https://github.com/EOS-Nation/mandel/issues/37)和[ 6月20日周报](https://eosnetwork.com/zh/blog/everything-eos-weekly-report-june-20th/)中了解相关信息。 最后，Yves还向社区暗示EOS将如何通过即将推出的[Trust EVM](https://twitter.com/TrustEvm/status/1541644936310710272)[赋能以太坊](https://twitter.com/BigBeardSamurai/status/1541508495136247808)，并邀请Vitalik在[ETH Toronto](https://twitter.com/BigBeardSamurai/status/1541508495136247808)展开交流，并[鼓励大家通过DM](https://twitter.com/BigBeardSamurai/status/1541790345624784897)等方式直接联系他，他将帮助每个人了解[新EOS](https://twitter.com/BigBeardSamurai/status/1541538941047808003)的故事。

与Vitalik的推文和Yves的推文相呼应的是，EOS社区在互动话题中发布了无数积极的信息，传播对EOS好处的认识。[EOS Support](https://twitter.com/Bishop3DCrea/status/1521134879072731141)的通信主管[Charles Bishop](https://twitter.com/Bishop3DCrea/status/1541518637235945473)感谢Yves的总结，并诚挚地邀请大家通过他们免费的由社区主导的实时支持团队来了解更多关于EOS的信息。

我们的[新开发者关系总监](https://eosnetwork.com/zh/blog/enf%e5%ae%a3%e5%b8%83%e6%96%b0%e4%bb%bb%e5%bc%80%e5%8f%91%e8%80%85%e5%85%b3%e7%b3%bb%e6%80%bb%e7%9b%91%ef%bc%9a%e4%b8%baeos%e5%bc%80%e5%8f%91%e6%b3%a8%e5%85%a5%e6%b4%bb%e5%8a%9b%ef%bc%8c%e4%bf%9d/)[Nathan James](https://twitter.com/nsjames_/status/1541494197135593474)邀请Vitalik在[EOS Discord](https://twitter.com/nsjames_/status/1541494197135593474)中进行合作，并策划了一些[有趣的MEMEs表情包](https://twitter.com/nsjames_/status/1541471091729760256)。[Trust EVM团队](https://twitter.com/TrustEvm/status/1541644936310710272)向Vitalik介绍了自己，并提供他们的服务来[帮助](https://eosnetwork.com/zh/blog/introducing-trust-evm-and-the-future-development-path-for-the-eos-evm/)以太坊开发者享受EOS的[技术优势](https://medium.com/@trustevm/how-will-trust-achieve-the-fastest-evm-7ffae53c14ab)。 还有来自[Brandon Lovejoy](https://twitter.com/AregHayrapetian/status/1541497898919071744)、[Helios](https://twitter.com/helios_rising_/status/1541533258726490112)、[Areg Hayrapetian](https://twitter.com/AregHayrapetian/status/1541497898919071744)、[Daniel Larimer](https://twitter.com/bytemaster7/status/1541523871706251265)、[Mell Pearce](https://twitter.com/Melpearce/status/1541472863642914816)、[EOS Marketplace](https://twitter.com/EOSPGLMLT_BP/status/1541477482724859904)和其他伟大的EOS社区领袖也围绕该事件发表了许多有用信息，您可以在本周的[EOS Hot Sauce](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SvZY_6ozgnU&t=59s)中看到相关消息。

Vitalik 的推文为 EOS 提供了与更广泛的全球受众建立联系的机会，EOS 社区迅速利用聚光灯效应创造了更多机会。

例如，EOS游戏[Liquiid Universe](https://twitter.com/beliquiid/status/1462283290187116547)的创始人[Corvin Meyer auf der Heide](https://genesis.eden.eoscommunity.org/members/cmadh.hodl)就利用此次机会邀请知名记者采访[EOS网络基金会领导人](https://twitter.com/cmadh_/status/1541462196487704576)。 EOS Bees为Vitalik制作了精美的[感谢信](https://twitter.com/EOS_Bees/status/1541835050714628096)，分享了有关[EOS独特的去中心化](https://twitter.com/EOS_Bees/status/1541514241995378690)的教育内容，并[分析](https://twitter.com/EOS_Bees/status/1541546657631899649)了与Vitalik推文互动的数十位最受欢迎的影响者的回应。当一位名叫WendyO的以太坊大V询问EOS时，Yves分享了为什么EOS生态的复出趋势是[不可避免](https://twitter.com/BigBeardSamurai/status/1541518946507055108)的，并提出加入[她的节目](https://twitter.com/BigBeardSamurai/status/1541518946507055108)来讨论EOS的想法。 我们还回复了[Everything EOS 周报](https://eosnetwork.com/zh/blog/category/everything-eos-weekly-report-zh/)的过往内容，展示了EOS[比以往任何时候都更有活力](https://twitter.com/EosNFoundation/status/1541515032672063489)，并以无与伦比的轨迹发展前进。

![](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/0\*Nh2WAtCY43d2scvD)

再例如，EOS网络基金会中文团队在中文推特上发起了一项围绕该事件的投票活动，中文社区成员可通过投票或者留言来发表对本次Vitalik赞扬EOS事件的看法，超过120+人参与本次活动，并且大部分中文EOS生态都认为：EOS网络基金会多措并举复兴生态，EOS正在卷土重来。中文社区释放的积极态度也让我们对于EOS生态精彩的付出故事更加有信心。

[https://twitter.com/EOSFoundationCN/status/1541709667302518784?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw%7Ctwcamp%5Etweetembed%7Ctwterm%5E1541709667302518784%7Ctwgr%5E%7Ctwcon%5Es1_c10&ref_url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.embedly.com%2Fwidgets%2Fmedia.html%3Ftype%3Dtext2Fhtmlkey%3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07schema%3Dtwitterurl%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Ftwitter.com%2Feosfoundationcn%2Fstatus%2F1541709667302518784image%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Fi.embed.ly%2F1%2Fimage3Furl3Dhttps253A252F252Fabs.twimg.com252Ferrors252Flogo46x38.png26key3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07](https://twitter.com/EOSFoundationCN/status/1541709667302518784?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw%7Ctwcamp%5Etweetembed%7Ctwterm%5E1541709667302518784%7Ctwgr%5E%7Ctwcon%5Es1_c10&ref_url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.embedly.com%2Fwidgets%2Fmedia.html%3Ftype%3Dtext2Fhtmlkey%3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07schema%3Dtwitterurl%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Ftwitter.com%2Feosfoundationcn%2Fstatus%2F1541709667302518784image%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Fi.embed.ly%2F1%2Fimage3Furl3Dhttps253A252F252Fabs.twimg.com252Ferrors252Flogo46x38.png26key3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07)

我们非常感谢Vitalik、EOS社区和以太坊社区带来的帮助。 您可以在本周的[围炉谈话](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=epOmRqmHefk&t=5607s)中了解更多关于我们对Vitalik表扬的回应，社区领袖讨论了EOS社区如何在Vitalik发帖后抓住机会并促进巨大增长。 我们很高兴Vitalik正在推广EOS的优势，并期待在未来与Vitalik和以太坊进行更多的合作。

我们还特别感谢[Vitalik](https://twitter.com/VitalikButerin/status/1541452416331268096)为我们提供了与他数百万才华横溢追随者建立联系的机会，并非常开心的看到EOS社区与更广泛的受众分享新EOS复出故事。 如果您有兴趣加入最激动人心的复出故事，并通过EOS造福人类，请随时[与我们联系](https://eosnetwork.com/zh/%e8%81%94%e7%b3%bb%e6%88%91%e4%bb%ac/)。

## 第三届Eden官方选举拉开帷幕

![](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/0\*ZGq4sz1KIkAEeJZz)

[第三届Eden官方选举](https://genesis.eden.eoscommunity.org/election)将于7月9日举行，我们鼓励所有人参与其中，帮助引领EOS的下一个真正民主时代。 凭借Eden国库中近20万枚EOS ，以及[Daniel Larimer](https://twitter.com/bytemaster7)在《[更平等的动物](https://moreequalanimals.com/posts/book-launch)》一书中概述的优雅ƒractal共识流程，即将举行的Eden选举提供了绝佳机会，能够在EOS构建[公共基础产品](https://eosnetwork.com/zh/blog/creating-positive-sum-games-for-public-goods-on-eos/)筹集资金。

自从4月[第二届Eden官方选举](https://youtu.be/1m1CWfFwuYw?t=9647)和新任首席代表[首次发声](https://youtu.be/1m1CWfFwuYw?t=9647)以来， Eden社区已经取得了一些令人兴奋的进展。EOS网络基金会首席执行官[Yves La Rose](https://eosnetwork.com/zh/%e5%85%b3%e4%ba%8e/)在上次选举中强调， Eden代表需要以[大胆的行动](https://youtu.be/AweOIPNyEnw?t=16225)迅速迭代，我们祝贺首席代表[Brock Pierce](https://genesis.eden.eoscommunity.org/members/brockpierce1)、[Chuck MacDonald](https://genesis.eden.eoscommunity.org/members/chkmacdonald)、[Edgar Fernandez](https://genesis.eden.eoscommunity.org/members/costaricamae)、[Gracie Lau](https://genesis.eden.eoscommunity.org/members/gracielau.gm)和[Michael O’Sullivan](https://genesis.eden.eoscommunity.org/members/bywire.com)为推动Eden的未来而采取的果断行动。

在首席代表的众多成就中，Eden通过正式将[Eden账户](https://bloks.io/account/eden#keys)的[active权限](https://bloks.io/account/genesis.eden#keys)移交给首席代表，获得了很大程度的独立性。 通过首席代表、[ƒractally](https://fractally.com/)前开发人员、[EOS网络基金会](https://eosnetwork.com/zh/%e5%85%b3%e4%ba%8e/)和[EOS DAO](https://eosnetwork.com/zh/%e7%a4%be%e5%8c%ba/)之间的合作，这种史无前例的[移交](https://bloks.io/msig/costaricamae/setedenkeys1)成为可能。

[https://twitter.com/helios_rising_/status/1542559318750396417?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw%7Ctwcamp%5Etweetembed%7Ctwterm%5E1542559318750396417%7Ctwgr%5E%7Ctwcon%5Es1_c10&ref_url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.embedly.com%2Fwidgets%2Fmedia.html%3Ftype%3Dtext2Fhtmlkey%3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07schema%3Dtwitterurl%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Ftwitter.com%2Fhelios_rising_%2Fstatus%2F1542559318750396417image%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Fi.embed.ly%2F1%2Fimage3Furl3Dhttps253A252F252Fabs.twimg.com252Ferrors252Flogo46x38.png26key3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07](https://twitter.com/helios_rising_/status/1542559318750396417?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw%7Ctwcamp%5Etweetembed%7Ctwterm%5E1542559318750396417%7Ctwgr%5E%7Ctwcon%5Es1_c10&ref_url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.embedly.com%2Fwidgets%2Fmedia.html%3Ftype%3Dtext2Fhtmlkey%3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07schema%3Dtwitterurl%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Ftwitter.com%2Fhelios_rising_%2Fstatus%2F1542559318750396417image%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Fi.embed.ly%2F1%2Fimage3Furl3Dhttps253A252F252Fabs.twimg.com252Ferrors252Flogo46x38.png26key3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07)

如上所述，[第三届Eden官方选举](https://genesis.eden.eoscommunity.org/election)选举将于UTC时间[7月9日13:00](https://twitter.com/NovaCryptoLTD/status/1543249320681639937)（北京时间7月9日21:00）举行，我们鼓励大家参与。 请注意，由于[技术原因](https://t.me/EdenOSinfo/39417)，[Eden会员门户网站](https://genesis.eden.eoscommunity.org/election)上的日期可能尚未更新，Eden社区正在努力更新代码以显示正确的日期。

## EOS中文社区开展GameFi主题茶话会

![](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/0\*rWBFFrQG8mFtXl7w)

凭借市场亮眼表现以及Play to Earn、DAO治理、去中心化等一系列属性，GameFi被很多人视为引领下一波的浪潮的潜力赛道，社区关于熊市GameFi打金玩法的讨论也不绝于耳。

2022年6月30日20:00，EOS网络基金会中文团队邀请W Labs瓜田实验室发起人瓜田做客EOS网络基金会中文Discord频道，举办EOS社区茶话会活动。

W Labs瓜田实验室起源于华语地区，是目前发展最快的链游内容聚合的社区平台，为链游玩家和游戏厂商提供最专业的游戏建议。

活动期间，瓜田围绕GameFi赛道潜力、公链GameFi生态孵化以及优质GameFi项目推荐等话题展开深度讨论，并称赞EOS作为高性能公链在发展GameFi方面的巨大优势。社区成员也可自由向嘉宾提问，探讨GameFi赛道发展。

此外，在活动结束时主持人将会宣布一个 「口令」，最先在 Discord 中文频道回复该口令的前2人，各获得 10 EOS奖励；在5分钟内回复该口令的所有人中，随机抽出另外3位，各获得10 EOS奖励。

通过本次活动，EOS中文社区能够进一步了解GameFi赛道发展现状，同时也让更广阔生态的更多人了解 EOS GameFi的发展最新动向，互动问答的方式也将为大家带来最专业的答疑解惑。

## TrustEVM可成为以太坊扩容方案：引发中文社区广泛讨论

[https://twitter.com/BigBeardSamurai/status/1542547935883366402?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw%7Ctwcamp%5Etweetembed%7Ctwterm%5E1542547935883366402%7Ctwgr%5E%7Ctwcon%5Es1_c10&ref_url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.embedly.com%2Fwidgets%2Fmedia.html%3Ftype%3Dtext2Fhtmlkey%3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07schema%3Dtwitterurl%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Ftwitter.com%2Fbigbeardsamurai%2Fstatus%2F1542547935883366402image%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Fi.embed.ly%2F1%2Fimage3Furl3Dhttps253A252F252Fabs.twimg.com252Ferrors252Flogo46x38.png26key3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07](https://twitter.com/BigBeardSamurai/status/1542547935883366402?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw%7Ctwcamp%5Etweetembed%7Ctwterm%5E1542547935883366402%7Ctwgr%5E%7Ctwcon%5Es1_c10&ref_url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.embedly.com%2Fwidgets%2Fmedia.html%3Ftype%3Dtext2Fhtmlkey%3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07schema%3Dtwitterurl%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Ftwitter.com%2Fbigbeardsamurai%2Fstatus%2F1542547935883366402image%3Dhttps3A%2F%2Fi.embed.ly%2F1%2Fimage3Furl3Dhttps253A252F252Fabs.twimg.com252Ferrors252Flogo46x38.png26key3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07)

一份摩根士丹利报告表示：转向 PoS 并不能解决以太坊的扩容问题。EOS 网络基金会创始人和首席执行官 Yves La Rose 在社交媒体转发此条报告并表示：

合并 (The Merge) 无助于解决以太坊扩容问题，但 EOS 可以，Trust EVM推出后，以太坊终于有了一个可行的扩容解决方案。

由于近日以太坊最受欢迎的Layer 2扩容方案Arbitrum出现网络拥堵及Gas高昂问题，以太坊性能问题再次成为热议话题，而Yves关于Trust EVM可以成为以太坊可行L2扩容方案这一观点，不仅吸引如[区块律动](https://www.theblockbeats.info/flash/90327)、[星球日报](https://www.odaily.news/newsflash/290808)、[链捕手](https://www.chaincatcher.com/article/2076051)、[PANews](https://www.panewslab.com/zh/sqarticledetails/ys8gl4qm.html)、[MarsBit](https://news.marsbit.co/flash/20220701121626952194.html)、[金色财经](https://www.jinse.com/lives/307658.html)等中国多家区块链媒体的报道，也在中文社区引发广泛热议，让更多人知道了Trust EVM的性能优势。

此前，Yves La Rose 曾在社交媒体表示：EOS 一直是高性能、低成本的 L1 区块链网络。脱离 Block.one 桎梏之后，EOS 社区有充分资金与人才，正在重新焕发活力卷土重来。EOS 并不旨在成为「以太坊杀手」，EOS 推出的 Trust EVM 或将成为以太坊首选的 L2 解决方案。

Trust EVM 是官方 EOS EVM 平台，具有确定性的 Gas 计算、指令集级别的 EVM 兼容性以及完全的 RPC 兼容等特性并即将登陆 EOS 主网。

EOS网络是区块链3.0时代的典范之作，由EOS VM提供支持。EOS VM是一个低延迟、高性能和可扩展的WebAssembly引擎，能够近乎无感的实现确定性交易执行。EOS网络专为Web 3设计，致力于实现最佳的Web 3用户和开发人员体验。EOS是EOSIO协议的旗舰区块链和金融中心，并通过EOS网络基金会（ENF）作为多链协作和发展公共基础产品的工具，进一步完善基础设施，驱动EOS快速发展。

title: 隐私公链Espresso Systems从WINDOWS安装到交互保姆级教程
body:
大家好，我是来自[NewAirDropS 社区](https://bit.ly/3xkxqjH) 的 [撸大发](https://twitter.com/coeli000)。

今天介绍 的是一个非常牛逼的隐私链项目——Espresso Systems。

当然项目还非常早期，测试过程比较复杂，大家要有心理准备，但我最喜欢挑战有难度的任务，所以开始吧。

我使用的是WINDOWS10 64位操作系统，一点一点摸索吧。

## 第一步：安装WSL

这一步就是在WINDOWS上安装一个UBUNTU虚拟机

### 1.在D盘下新建一个文件夹

我命名为：

TestDocker

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/tEVmeMn3xGMGSmJ_dPVkP.png?height=342&width=331)

现在这个文件夹在系统中的目录地址就是：

D:\\TestDocker

这个要记住，后面需要用到。

### 2.打开POWERSHELL

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/-HTnBbLcWUtkhALPWzE05.png?height=1689&width=1834)

这时会出现 一个弹出对话框，要求确认是否真的要“以管理员身份运行”PowerShell

点击“是”之后进入下面的界面：

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/cCkX3GSJm6TsjARVbKKJI.png?height=1848&width=2241)

现在我们准备安装WSL

### 3.输入命令安装WSL

在PowerShell窗口中输入下面的命令

wsl --install

如图：

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/m645jkKnN4xuYvCgHCFBq.png?height=1837&width=2219)

输入命令完成后，要按键盘上的 回车键

会看到安装进度：

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/8jv5F2wDNvzpEbz0WX_Py.png?height=1846&width=2240)

需要安装一系列部件，所以需要一些时间，需要耐心等待，见下图的进度指示：

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/bGgQyoCcB-p4Ajqfh_8VS.png?height=1603&width=2202)

直到出现下面的提示，才安装完成了wsl.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/pSzz9qIQH-9psnyMTU24V.png?height=1824&width=2211)

这时，我们需要重新启动电脑。

### 4.重新启动电脑

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/J4damKwY6D8oZY_eAs0Qh.png?height=511&width=633)

### 5.继续安装UBUNtu虚拟机

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Gw_1sV1FObYQ4WbF9j7pv.png?height=1293&width=2455)

重新启动后，系统 会自动继续安装UBUNTU虚拟机，我们要耐心等待安装 完成

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/K0U8tYQC1K36onRIH5vh5.png?height=1275&width=2448)

### 6.设置UBUNTU虚拟机的用户名和密码

如上图所示，我们需要设置自己的用户名和密码：

先输入用户名，然后按回车键，下图是我的输入：

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/GvAvFCnwnO-UI87PnptKl.png?height=1275&width=2448)

然后，我们要设置密码：（密码输入后也要按回车）

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/2w-m5_PZBJU8kAkPOMBs-.png?height=1279&width=2457)

再输入一遍密码，并按回车

就进入了下面的界面。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/-B90YpgAog-zGmmNXC0Nb.png?height=1275&width=2448)

如果出现上图的界面，那就是成功了，但是如果出现下面的界面，那就是失败了：

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/EYlMVyY8E1KiMyQBYVGax.png?height=883&width=1666)

这时，我们需要按官方文档指示去处理：

[官方文档链接](https://github.com/microsoft/WSL/issues/4194)：

[https://github.com/microsoft/WSL/issues/4194](https://github.com/microsoft/WSL/issues/4194)

## 第二步：安装DOCKER

现在开始安装DOCKER

### 1.进入官方网站

[https://www.docker.com/](https://www.docker.com/)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/pLNyIrXTXic0f1lSeoc8i.png?height=1791&width=3718)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/pKym8WohhmxugbsokWyNC.png?height=1550&width=1423)

等待下载完成后，开始安装

### 2.安装DOCKER

首先找到下载的安装包：

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/aZLtx6et6f_0Ppxwb71GR.png?height=385&width=327)

双击安装

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/9TEih5mZD7r-ZyQ1R7z6o.png?height=1216&width=1782)

根据网络速度的不同，安装过程可能需要一些时间，一定要耐心等待，否则就需要完全卸载DOCKER再重新安装 ，比较麻烦。

下图是安装过程：

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/DYirp3zfVA9IFhAbo4lPm.png?height=1226&width=1774)

耐心等待安装完成后，是这样子的：

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/fPxnRNJD9UVAVoeSQHvUe.png?height=1226&width=1774)

注意，点击上面的按钮后，又需要重新启动电脑 ！！

### 3.重新启动电脑

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Y_fD1WNDzkplG4tsQ6-e2.png?height=511&width=633)

### 4.继续配置DOCKER

重新启动电脑 后，我们需要继续设置

重启电脑 后，自动进入这个界面：

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/8TogcXoINxUmQET31IXGQ.png?height=1500&width=2000)

title: HUDDLN RADIO
body:
For the first half of 2022, I’ve been fortunate to co-host a weekly Web3 music discussion with some extremely talented artists. These artists have been incredibly kind while sharing their music and their journey with moments of wisdom, vulnerability, and comedy. All of these artists have been authentic and transparent about their passion – not consciously, but because there is no alternative. As opposed to the constant shill-fest and development ambiguity we’ve grown accustomed to with most pfp projects, the authenticity exuded by these individuals couldn’t be more endearing.

Constructing a real community comes from forging genuine connections. Having a safe space for people ranging from artists, to community managers, and founders to express their true self and passion is likely to galvanize an audience much more than simply describing a project and future plans. The motivation for a project, a funny childhood story, spicy banter between peers – all resonate with the crowd in different ways. These ways can later be pointed to as why someone tuned in for the next episode, retweeted, or decided to purchase. Some of these magical moments become lore, but they should be shared how they occurred verbatim.

**This is one of the many reasons why we are pleased to announce HUDDLN RADIO.**

[https://www.huddln.io/](https://www.huddln.io/)

We’re making the most out of Twitter Spaces and helping create a place where people can show who they really are without having to do it all on their own:

* Promoting awareness of the space so people can catch it live.
* Posting the recording to podcast services so it can be shared in the future.
* Clipping and sharing good moments.

We’re handling most of the logistics so the live space & podcast don’t feel like a chore. To top things off, hosts and live listeners will earn XP on the HUDDLN platform simply for attending. Think of XP as a reward system that will allow you to redeem what you’ve earned in the app and through other events for perks such as matic, being featured within the app, first access to new features, etc.

While new developments on this journey are a certainty, we couldn’t be more excited to get this started! Keep an eye out for upcoming announcements about the schedule in the days ahead – see you soon.

title: Blockchain 有什么价值?
body:
## 什么是价值？

再谈论 Blockchain 有什么价值之前，我觉得必须先得定义什么是价值。 我个人简单的把价值分为两种：

1. 一种是为人类文明进步的价值。
2. 另外一种是有人想要并且给出了一个能够买到的价格。

人类历史上的任何东西都可以简单的用这两种类型归结，我举几个例子

**电力** 我认为电力对人类文明进步有巨大的价值，但是获取电力的价格并不贵（正常情况下）。

**爱马仕的包**  我认为奢侈品并没有为人类文明进步带来价值，但是获取奢侈品的价格非常昂贵。

**SpaceX的火箭** 我认为 SpaceX 的火箭对人类文明进步有巨大的价值，而且价格会是非常的昂贵。

**这一篇Blog** 我认为这一篇文章对人类文明进步毫无意义，并且不值一钱。

两种价值相互并不冲突，并且本质完全不同。所以如果你要问我 Blockchain 有什么价值类似的问题的时候，我可能会需要明确的知道你问的是对人类文明进步的价值，还是能够买到 Blockchain 的价格价值。

下面我将围绕着这两种不同类型的价值观点结合我当前的认知来进行简单的探讨和解释。

## BlockChain 的人类文明价值

### 什么是 Blockchain ？

通过一段时间的学习，我现在用一句话来解释我所理解的 Blockchain —— 在数学和密码学的基础上构建的一个只能增加不可修改历史数据的数字所有权管理系统。

Blockchain 带来的前所未有的改变是所有权直接天赋到了每一个钱包地址上。每一个钱包地址在所有权上是平等并且不可能被恶意修改的。进一步获得了钱包地址与钱包地址天然的信任。 这就是我目前觉得 Blockchain 最基本也是最重要的能力。 目前我能见到的所有天花乱坠的词语、产品全部都基于此。

### 从智人获胜到独立宣言，人类文明核心的个人解读

我想要继续讨论一些好像跟 Blockchain 无关的事情。

我记得曾经我看过的书中有说为什么最后是智人获胜。大概原因就是智人发展出了语言，利用语言的交流获得了相互的信任，然后达成了共识的智人把尼安德特人等其他人种从地球上抹去。

简单的说独立宣言是北美13块殖民地的代表们相互信任，讨论然后达成的共识。目前该共识的结果是缔造了当前世界的第一强国。

由这两个简单的例子，就可草率的推论出只要通过信任达成共识，人类文明会爆发出巨大的能量。

不过有趣的是，每一个人自带了傲慢、嫉妒、暴怒、懒惰、贪婪、暴食和色欲。在物理世界里面要通过信任达成一个共识，是非常非常困难的。

这导致了当前世界上无论是政府、公司、家庭各式各样的组织形式又或者人类生产生活的全方面因为信任和共识的而产生了大大小小的问题。

### Blockchain 为人类文明带来的价值展望

这时候 Blockchain 出现了，它天然的解决了信任和共识问题。我认为 Blockchain 的人类文明价值在于给出了，多一种构建信任和共识的选项。 这样有可能能解决一下当前不是很好解决的问题。

在我的想象中 Blockchain 技术将会变得跟电力一样渗透到人类文明的方方面面，为人类遇到有信任，共识、所有权的场景中充当基础部件。然后重构整个人类文明的结构体系，提高生产效率。将人类文明带入下一个纪元。

## Blockchain 的价格价值

说了这么多，来说点简单的 Blockchain 的价格价值。为了简化问题就将变成“为什么BTC，ETH，NFT这么贵？” 回答，因为有人愿意出这多钱买。仅此而已。

如果再要解释那我会说两个亿万富豪和一坨狗屎的故事。

千金难买我高兴。

再难理解，就理解为奢侈品即可。

title: Polkadex訂單簿現已在公測中可用
body:
新版本標誌著可信執行環境技術與區塊鏈（公共測試網）相結合的首次大規模應用。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/R441jSJdxHfQ87hYmWLYZ.png?height=691&width=1400)

時機已到。[期待已久的 Polkadex 訂單簿現已在公共 Polkadex 測試網上上線。](https://orderbook-beta.polkadex.trade/)

但這還不是全部：此版本也標誌著[Polkadex 公測](https://github.com/Polkadex-Substrate/Polkadex-Open-Beta)的開始，新的公測獎勵計劃取代了之前的內測計劃。

## 什麼是Polkadex訂單簿？

Polkadex 的旗艦產品[Polkadex Orderbook](https://docs.polkadex.trade/orderbookIntroduction)是一種非託管、基於訂單簿的加密貨幣交易所，可實現跨鏈資產的高頻交易。Polkadex 訂單簿將中心化交易所（CEX）的所有功能和速度與去中心化交易所（DEX）交易的安全性和透明度相結合。作為建立在 Polkadex 網絡上的尖端 Layer 2 可信執行環境（TEE），Polkadex Orderbook 將是去中心化交易演進的一次飛躍。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/qNJryxR-o1Q-pj7jirTAw.png?height=1149&width=1400)

## 為什麼這個版本很重要？

這是Orderbook的TEE 和區塊鏈第一次在一個版本中相互連接。將這兩個組件放在一起，交到未來的 Polkadex 用戶手中，是 Polkadex 的一個重要里程碑。換句話說，這個版本是迄今為止 Polkadex 中所有工作的高潮，從構思階段到持續的錯誤修復和改進。

此版本也是直接向公共測試網推出並跳過私有測試階段的首批 Polkadex 版本之一。Orderbook 測試網的發布開啟了 Polkadex 產品測試的新階段：Polkadex Open Beta。

## Polkadex公測

考慮到盡可能廣泛的社區反饋，我們的唯一目標是讓 Polkadex 產品變得更好，我們正在推出 Polkadex 開放測試版。該計劃將使更廣泛的 Polkadex 社區有機會測試 Polkadex 產品並在發布前更新，提供反饋並獲得獎勵；同時幫助 Polkadex 團隊交付最初設想的產品的更好版本。

在此處了解有關 Polkadex 公開測試版以及如何開始提供反饋和賺取 PDEX 的更多[信息](https://github.com/Polkadex-Substrate/Polkadex-Open-Beta)。

# 測試Polkadex訂單簿

為了測試 Polkadex Orderbook，您需要測試PDEX的網絡費用以及一些測試 DOT 和測試 ETH 進行交易，因為 beta 期間的交易對將是測試 PDEX/測試 DOT 和測試 PDEX/測試 ETH。[您可以從 Token Manager beta 界面上的 Test Token Faucet 領取測試令牌。](https://beta.tokenmanager.polkadex.trade/)獲得測試代幣後，[您就可以開始測試訂單簿了！](https://orderbook-beta.polkadex.trade/login)

## 以下是此版本中要測試的內容列表：

1. 使用您的 Polkadex 主賬戶創建代理（訂單簿）賬戶。您需要點擊[Orderbook 登錄頁面](https://orderbook-beta.polkadex.trade/login)上的“註冊”按鈕，然後按照後續步驟操作。
2. 將代幣從您的主賬戶存入 Orderbook 的代理賬戶。本質上，此更新允許您將餘額存入 Orderbook TEE 上的代理賬戶。您必須找到錢包部分並存入您的測試 PDEX、ETH 和 DOT。此版本目前僅支持從您的區塊鏈賬戶向代理賬戶存款。將很快添加對提款的支持。
3. 下限價單和市場買賣交易。
4. 檢查圖表的實時更新。
5. 檢查您的訂單和交易歷史。
6. 查看最近的交易事件。
7. 取消訂單。

## 測試並賺取

在測試時，請務必注意是否有任何問題，Polkadex 開發人員是否可以在某些領域工作，或者您是否有任何其他建議。請務必按照[Polkadex Open Beta 指南](https://github.com/Polkadex-Substrate/Polkadex-Open-Beta)中的說明將**問題記錄到 GitHub以獲得 PDEX 獎勵**。

[點擊這裡了解更多關於 Polkadex 公測以及如何通過測試 Polkadex 產品獲得獎勵。](https://github.com/Polkadex-Substrate/Polkadex-Open-Beta)

## 從測試網到主網

雖然 Orderbook 測試網的發布是一項偉大的成就，但這只是 Polkadex Orderbook 主網發布和全面實現 Polkadex 願景的重要一步。Polkadex 公測階段的目標是讓產品達到完全穩定，並且只有在實現這一目標後，才會在不久之後將它們推出到主網上。同時，Polkadex 公測計劃的啟動也將有助於營造一種文化，在這種文化中，不僅鼓勵社區反饋，而且是產品開發的重要組成部分。請記住，這是一項正在進行的工作，我們將在未來幾天內添加更多功能和微調產品元素。

title: 币安首席执行官表示，它在最近的加密交易中优先选择了 FTX
body:
* Binance 和 FTX 正在积极寻求支持陷入困境的加密公司
* 在 FTX 开始谈判以 2500 万美元收购加密货币贷方 BlockFi 后，围绕收购的对话成为主流

熊市引发了一系列的抛售。币安首席执行官赵长鹏现在表示，该交易所可能首先选择了其竞争对手 FTX，后者正在谈判以2500 万美元[收购](https://blockworks.co/crypto-exchange-ftx-to-acquire-beleaguered-lender-blockfi/)加密货币贷方 BlockFi。 

“你在新闻上看到的同样的交易，他们通常会先找我们，”赵在接受Bankless的直播[采访时说。](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lldGpGsUcWw)“我非常有信心，我们目前拥有迄今为止最大的现金储备。”

尽管赵看到了向陷入困境的加密公司伸出援手的重

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/4fHHfZyQWrVvAep56jzuq.png?height=900&width=1600)

要性，但他强调“并非所有项目都值得拯救”。

“我们不想救助管理不善的公司，”他说。“我们确实希望帮助大多数有一点流动性紧缩的公司度过这个周期，我们 \[目前\] 正在与其中 50 多家进行交谈。”

去中心化金融 (DeFi) 领域的许多借贷协议总部位于美国。赵说，最近的流动性危机导致该地区发生了更多交易。这位加密货币亿万富翁补充说，与拥有更多全球影响力的 Binance 相比，FTX 的美国部门可以专注于帮助更多的本地公司。

“这不是我们对抗他们，”赵说。“我们\[应该\]尽我们所能。”

业内一些人认为，赵和 FTX 首席执行官 Sam Bankman-Fried 正在共同努力，以支持随着流动性紧缩的展开而受到威胁的加密货币行业的关键部分。“SBF 和币安的 CZ 等其他大公司正在支撑这个市场。他们都在不知疲倦地工作以支持该行业，”一家大型投资银行的一位不愿透露姓名的高级管理人员在最近的一次采访中告诉 Blockworks。

赵将币安迄今为止在熊市中的生存归功于了解市场的周期性并持有大量现金储备。他希望借此机会招聘人才，巩固市场。

该交易所目前拥有 2,000 多个职位空缺，其中一半是工程职位。其他职位包括客户支持、营销、法律和合规。 

“我们希望到今年年底达到大约 8,000 人，”赵说。“我确实想退休，迟早。我担任币安 CEO 五年了，我认为 CEO 不应该 \[持有头衔\] 超过 10 年。”

title: 复见少时月（一）
body:
我在农村生活多年，印象最为深刻的是村庄的安静。

和每一个古老的村庄一样，这种安静似乎从历史深处走来，穿越时空，数百年数千年都未曾变化过，对它而言，时间好像停止了一样。除此之外，就是凸显这份安静的鸡鸣、狗吠、鸟叫、虫鸣和蛙声，以至于长大后有几次在半睡半醒间，耳边（脑海）中出现这种声音，顿时在梦境中回到了少时的农村，我所有的感触心绪都回去了。

有一年春天，正值插秧时节，我放学回家，天还很早，我翻过庙垭口，往下看去，一湾的水田在仍比较高的太阳下波光粼粼，乡亲们正在水田里插秧，大概有几十人在同时劳动，这么多人一起我应该是第一次看到，人们相互比赛，看谁插的秧苗又快又稳，好不热闹。四周的青蛙叫个不停，田埂上还有黄牛和几只羊，还有几个小孩在大闹，整个湾里一片热火朝天的景象，真是平时少有的场景。

很多年后，农民们也不再种水稻了，村里的牛羊也少了，剩下的也只有那份不变的安静和年年依旧的蛙声了。

势能强，2021 年全球区块链初创企业融资金额达 252 亿美元，同比增长超

700%。我们认为Web3.0 将与AR/VR、AI等技术融合发展，开创新阶段。

Web3.0 已具备体系性的基础设施。Web3.0 生态核心特征是相对去中心化

（基于区块链）和经济激励体系（基于Token机制）。对于前者，海外市场目

前已经有以太坊、Solona、FTX等公链，国内有如长安链等联盟链。此

外，智能合约、DAO等机制有希望成为Web3.0 时代的执行和协作机制。

最后，一方面Token经济体系可以成为代表Web3.0 生态各种权利的基础单

位，另一方面Token经济体系也是激励生态参与方的核心机制，其有希望成

为Web3.0 发展自驱力。

Web3.0 应用仍处于萌芽期。DeFi发展相对成熟，能够实现交易、借贷、

融资等职能，其中交易所成为行业“流量入口”，包括Binance等中心化交

易所以及Uniswap等去中心化交易所。其次，NFT市场近 1-2 年发展迅

速，今年 2 月NFT总市值已达 180 亿美元。GameFi凭借P2E的特色，已有

Axie Infinity、STEPN等爆款应用，GameFi有希望成为应用的下一风口。

最后，SocialFi、广告和搜索仍处于探索期。

理由

Web3.0 VS Web2.0，预计相当长时间仍将共存。Web2.0 以效率优先，

Web3.0 则更强调兼顾公平，我们认为这两种侧重将成为未来用户选择应用

的重要标准。考虑到Web3.0 阶段仍处于发展初期，我们预计Web2.0 与

Web3.0 二者长时间内或共存。另外，我们认为公开透明、更公平的分配机

制等方向也有望成为Web2.0 大厂改良的重点方向。最后，积极布局

Web3.0 时代也成为海内外互联网大厂的选项。

正视Web3.0 潜在风险。Web3.0 处于发展早期、强调去中心化及自带经济

体系等特征使得当前存在诸多风险。目前我国政府对于区块链持相对开放

态度，数字藏品等持相对谨慎态度，但对代币、匿名机制等明令禁止。此

外，美国政府也在推行针对不同资产分类别进行监管的法案，未来有望在

投资者保护上加强监管。而其他国家政府更多聚焦反洗钱与反恐融资风险

进行防御性监管。此外，部分国家针对加密企业推出牌照制度（如日韩、

新加坡等）。

风险

货币政策收紧带来市场波动风险；匿名机制带来洗钱、偷漏税等风险；

Token机制可能伤害投资者等风险；技术、机制设置漏洞等风险。

title: 隐私公链Espresso Systems从WINDOWS安装到交互保姆级教程
body:
大家好，我是来自[NewAirDropS 社区](https://bit.ly/3xkxqjH) 的 [撸大发](https://twitter.com/coeli000)。

今天介绍 的是一个非常牛逼的隐私链项目——Espresso Systems。

当然项目还非常早期，测试过程比较复杂，大家要有心理准备，但我最喜欢挑战有难度的任务，所以开始吧。

我使用的是WINDOWS10 64位操作系统，一点一点摸索吧。

## 第一步：安装WSL

这一步就是在WINDOWS上安装一个UBUNTU虚拟机

### 1.在D盘下新建一个文件夹

我命名为：

TestDocker

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/tEVmeMn3xGMGSmJ_dPVkP.png?height=342&width=331)

现在这个文件夹在系统中的目录地址就是：

D:\\TestDocker
